de-covert_operatives.title: Covert Operatives
de-covert_operatives.def: The unit gains Skirmisher, Hard Target(1).

de-altar_of_nabh.title: Altar of Nabh
de-altar_of_nabh.def:
The model gains Attached, Exclusive(Height 1), Frenzy, Fury, , WarPlatform, Unruly.
Model parts with Elf in friendly units within 12" of the model gain Fury.

de-altar_of_tila.title: Altar of Tila
de-altar_of_tila.def:
The models Cha and Mob are always set to 0". It gains Channel (2), Emplacement, Exclusive, Fearless, Stubborn, Unstable.
When another friendly unit within 18" of the model suffers one or more unsaved wounds from an enemy attack, the Altar of Tila may choose to cause 3 hits with Str 4 and AP 2 onto the enemy unit which caused the wounds. This effect can only be used once per phase.

de-altar_of_yema.title: Altar of Yema
de-altar_of_yema.def: The model gains Attached, , Exclusive(Height 1), , Petrifying Stare, , WarPlatform. Whenever a friendly unit within 12" is initiating a Move (see Definition and Terminology chapter in the Reference Handbook), the unit gains +1 Mob and Devastating Charge(Strider) for the duration of the Player Turn.

de-temple_acolytes.title: Temple Acolytes
de-temple_acolytes.def: The Dread Acolyte model part gains Artistry of Death, Paired Weapons and Temple.

de-warlock_acolytes.title: Warlock Acolytes
de-warlock_acolytes.def: The unit gains Wizard Conclave(2), <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/irresistible_will">Irresistible Will</nuxt-link>.  The Dread Acolyte model part gains Warlock. The unit selects its spells from:

de-academy_commander.title: Academy Commander
de-academy_commander.def: The model part gains Academy. Models with Academy in the model's unit gain Artistry of Death.

de-beastmaster.title: Beastmaster
de-beastmaster.def:
The model part gains Slaver. Apply the following effects to units within range of this model's Commanding Presence (friend or foe):
  • Friendly units containing Beast: Courage Tests gain Minimised.
  • Friendly units: Rolls for the number of hits from Stomp Attack gain Maximised.
  • Enemy units: Rolls for the number of hits from Stomp Attack gain Minimised.

de-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
de-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Scent of Blood and treats all friendly models with Beast as Insignificant.

de-coastal_predator.title: Coastal Predator
de-coastal_predator.def: The model gains Hard Target(1) while in contact with a Water Terrain Feature.

de-colossal_kraken.title: Colossal Kraken
de-colossal_kraken.def: The model's base size is changed to 100×150 mm, its HP is set to 8, and the model gains 2 additional Lashmasters.

de-extraordinary_specimen.title: Extraordinary Specimen
de-extraordinary_specimen.def: The Manticore gains Stomp Attack(D3) and its base size is changed to 50×100 mm.

de-under_the_cover_of_mists.title: Under the Cover of Mists
de-under_the_cover_of_mists.def: Enemy units within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans suffer -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks. During the first Game Turn, friendly Height 1 models gain Hard Target(1) while within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans.

de-dancers_of_yema.title: Dancers of Yema
de-dancers_of_yema.def: The unit's restriction is changed from Regular to Common. The model gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks), First Strike(+1 Att), Elven Finesse, Weapon Master. It also gains Shield, Hand Weapon, Great Weapon, Halberd .

de-daeb_warfare.title: Daeb Warfare
de-daeb_warfare.def: When a unit containing Daeb Warfare is part of a Combined Charge, its Charge Range rolls gain Maximised. When multiple units containing Daeb Warfare are Engaged in the same Combined Combat, each unit gains First Strike(Resolute (1)).

de-irresistible_will.title: Irresistible Will
de-irresistible_will.def: When casting a Learned spell , any Dispelling Roll made against the Casting Roll  suffers a -1 modifier.

de-scent_of_blood.title: Scent of Blood
de-scent_of_blood.def: Charge Range rolls made by units with Scent of Blood gain Maximised if the target of the Charge contains a Health Pool that has fewer Health Points than its starting value.

de-krakens_hide.title: Kraken's Hide
de-krakens_hide.def: The wearer gains +1 Arm and Strider(Water Terrain).

de-artistry_of_death.title: Artistry of Death
de-artistry_of_death.def: Standard Melee Attacks gain +1 to wound.

de-petrifying_stare.title: Petrifying Stare
de-petrifying_stare.def: At the model's Agility Step, each enemy unit in contact with the model suffers 2 hits that are set to-wound on 5+ , and the hits always have AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

de-repeater_crossbow.title: Repeater Crossbow
de-repeater_crossbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater CrossbowX18"230
[Attacks made at Short Range have their AP set to 1]

de-repeater_handbow.title: Repeater Handbow
de-repeater_handbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater HandbowX12"230
Quick to Fire, Accurate, Stand and Shoot

de-harpoon_launcher.title: Harpoon Launcher
de-harpoon_launcher.def:
Units that suffer one or more hits from this weapon lose Swiftstride(if they had it), and cannot gain it in any way. Duration: until the start of the Active Player's next Turn.

Harpoon Launcher - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Harpoon Launcher318"363Accurate, Quick to Fire, Harpoon Launcher


Harpoon Launcher

Units that suffer one or more hits from this weapon lose Swiftstride(if they had it), and cannot gain it in any way. Duration: until the start of the Active Player's next Turn.

de-daeb_bolt_thrower.title: Daeb Bolt Thrower
de-daeb_bolt_thrower.def:
-

Range 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2.
Note that the model can move and shoot.

Daeb Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Daeb Bolt Thrower324"852 -

Range 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2.
Note that the model can move and shoot.

de-cut_one_off_.title: Cut one off ...
de-cut_one_off_.def: For each successfull Regeneration Save roll of a natural ‘6’, the model disregards another simultaneously suffered wound. If there are not enough simultaneously suffered wounds to disregard, the model immediately Recovers 1 HP instead.

de-professional_courtesy.title: Professional Courtesy
de-professional_courtesy.def: The model cannot join units that contain another model from the same unit entry.

de-ruthless_efficiency.title: Ruthless Efficiency
de-ruthless_efficiency.def: The attack gains +1 to wound during the First Round of Combat.

de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.title: Curse of the Phantom Queen
de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.def:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

de-transcendence.title: Transcendence
de-transcendence.def: For each HP loss the wielder inflicts with this weapon on enemy models, the wielder gains +1 Str and +1 AP, up to a maximum of +2 each, with Duration: Permanent.

de-mastery_of_slaughter.title: Mastery of Slaughter
de-mastery_of_slaughter.def: +1 Str and +1 AP. If the wielder causes one or more unsaved wounds with this weapon, then all attacks made by Rank-and-File models in its unit, gain +1 to hit until the end of the Round of Combat.

de-seal_of_the_republic.title: Seal of the Republic
de-seal_of_the_republic.def: For each HP loss the wearer inflicts with Standard Melee Attacks  on enemy models, the wearer gains +1 Arm with Duration: Permanent.

de-moithirs_mirror.title: Moithir's Mirror
de-moithirs_mirror.def:
The bearer gains Aegis (5+, {} against Melee Attacks). If one or more Melee Attacks are allocated towards the bearer, the bearer gains Grind Attack(3, Str 4, AP 2, Magical Attacks) until the end of the Round of Combat. This Grind Attack is resolved with Agi 0.

(Note that attacks made at Agi step 0 can trigger this effect.)

de-beastmasters_vial.title: Beastmaster's Vial
de-beastmasters_vial.def: May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. A friendly unit with Beast within 12" of the bearer gains Dying Blow until it is no longer Engaged in Combat.

de-ceinrans_scales.title: Ceinran's Scales
de-ceinrans_scales.def: The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(3+).

de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.title: Ring of the Obsidian Thrones
de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.def: Unless the wearer is Shaken, Break Tests and Panic Tests taken by friendly units within 6" of the wearer are Minimised.

de-banner_of_blood.title: Banner of Blood
de-banner_of_blood.def: Exclusive(Captain). The unit's maximum size is changed to 15 models for units with Height 1, and to 6 models for units with Height 2. Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the bearer's unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Att).

de-eye_of_the_gorgon.title: Eye of the Gorgon
de-eye_of_the_gorgon.def: The bearer's unit gains Horror. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities at the start of a Round of Combat, nominate one Rank-and-File model in the front rank of the bearer's unit. The nominated model gains Petrifying Stare.

de-caedhrens_pennon.title: Caedhren's Pennon
de-caedhrens_pennon.def: While the bearer's unit is part of a Combined Charge, the unit and all other units part of this Combined Charge must reroll failed Charge Range rolls and gain Devastating Charge(Hard Target(1)).

ong-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ong-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/brood_rivalry">Brood Rivalry</nuxt-link>, Unruly, and gains Orc.

ong-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ong-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its rolls for the number of hits for Stomp Attack is Maximised.

ong-giant_club.title: Giant Club
ong-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

+1 Str and +1 AP.

+1 Str and +1 AP.

ong-armed_to_the_teeth.title: Armed to the Teeth
ong-armed_to_the_teeth.def:
- Melee Weapon

The model gains Weapon Master and its Arm is set to 2.
At the start of each Round of Combat that the model is fighting, if the model is within 12" of one or more friendly models that are equipped with: Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, and/or Shield, the model gains the corresponding equipment until the end of the Round of Combat.

The model gains Weapon Master and its Arm is set to 2.
At the start of each Round of Combat that the model is fighting, if the model is within 12" of one or more friendly models that are equipped with: Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, and/or Shield, the model gains the corresponding equipment until the end of the Round of Combat.

ong-gnasher_dashers.title: Gnasher Dashers
ong-gnasher_dashers.def: The model gains Fly, Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Extra Support(2).

ong-git_launcher.title: Git Launcher
ong-git_launcher.def: A unit hit by a Git Launcher suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 2. However, on a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’, instead, place a Mad Git within 3" of the target, following the rules for Summoned Units.

ong-skewerer.title: Skewerer
ong-skewerer.def: The model's base is changed to 60×60 mm.

ong-goblin_gardens.title: Goblin Gardens
ong-goblin_gardens.def: During Pre-game Selections, you may choose a Terrain Type from: Field, Forest, Ruins, Water Terrain. All models (friend and foe) treat Terrain Features of the chosen Terrain Type as Dangerous Terrain(6). In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider(X), where X is the chosen Terrain.

ong-spies.title: Spies
ong-spies.def: The model gains , Light Troops, Vanguard.

ong-beastie_whisperer.title: Beastie Whisperer
ong-beastie_whisperer.def: Immediately before choosing a unit to join using the Hidden rule, the model may gain a Beastie mount without any upgrade for free. If the model joins a unit with at least one Rank-and-File model with Creepy-Crawlies, the model's mount gains Creepy-Crawlies.

ong-headhunter.title: Headhunter
ong-headhunter.def: The model part with Goblin gains March and Shoot, Poison Attacks (Melee and Shooting), and gains Throwing Weapons (4+) with Shots 3.

ong-mauler.title: Mauler
ong-mauler.def: The model part with Goblin gains Fury, First Strike(Hatred), and gains Great Weapon.

ong-creepers.title: Creepers
ong-creepers.def: The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Strider.

ong-green_tide.title: Green Tide
ong-green_tide.def: Natural to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with Melee Attacks from friendly units within 8" must be rerolled.

ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.title: Symbol of the Warborn Alliance
ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.def: The model can cast Guile and Fury (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+). When attempting to cast the Bound Spell, the owner can choose which version to cast.

ong-immense_bulk.title: Immense Bulk
ong-immense_bulk.def: The model's HP are set to 8, its base size is changed to 100×150 mm, and the number of Rider model parts is set to 8.

ong-slithering_frame.title: Slithering Frame
ong-slithering_frame.def: The model gains Regeneration (5+), Random Movement(3D6").

ong-wicked_horns.title: Wicked Horns
ong-wicked_horns.def: The model gains Frenzy, Impact Hits(D6), Unruly.

ong-surprise.title: Surprise
ong-surprise.def: The model cannot be deployed normally. Instead, at the start of any Player Turn, the owner may choose a friendly non-Shaken Unengaged unit of Goblin Rabble or Gogtuk Neophytes. Any unit can be chosen up to three times per Player Turn. Deploy the model with Surprise within 3" of the chosen unit and more than 1" away from Impassable Terrain and other units. If the model is not deployed by the end of Game Turn 4, it is Destroyed and is removed as a casualty .

ong-huntsman_spider.title: Huntsman Spider
ong-huntsman_spider.def:
The model gains Creepy-Crawlies, and its base size is changed to 50×50 mm.

The model gains\ Creepy-Crawlies, and its base size is changed to 50×50 mm.

ong-troll_toll.title: Troll Toll
ong-troll_toll.def:
- Attack Attribute -- Close Combat

For each Regeneration Save the model fails against enemy Melee Attacks, the model immediately performs a Standard Melee Attack against the unit that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, that is allocated onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

For each Regeneration Save the model fails against enemy Melee Attacks, the model immediately performs a Standard Melee Attack against the unit that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, that is allocated onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

ong-cave_troll.title: Cave Troll
ong-cave_troll.def: The model's Arm is set to 3 and it gains Strider(Ruins).

ong-bridge_troll.title: Bridge Troll
ong-bridge_troll.def: The model gains Distracting(1), Strider(Water Terrain).

ong-forest_troll.title: Forest Troll
ong-forest_troll.def: The model gains Magic Resistance (3), Strider(Forest).

ong-big_wing.title: Big Wing
ong-big_wing.def:
The model gains Stomp Attack(D3+1) and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm.

The model gains\ Stomp Attack(D3+1) and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm.

ong-tribe_leader.title: Tribe Leader
ong-tribe_leader.def:
If the General is a Tribe Leader, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units with Goblin.

  • The Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. Max. X units/army, Max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units with Orc are modified, as indicated by TL X.
For example, Max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Tribe Leader, the Duplication Limit becomes Max. 2 units/army.

ong-darrmu.title: Darrmu
ong-darrmu.def:
If the General is a Darrmu, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units with Orc.

  • The Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. Max. X units/army, Max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units with Goblin are modified, as indicated by D X.
For example, Max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Darrmu, the Duplication Limit becomes Max. 2 units/army.

ong-goblin_cunning.title: Goblin Cunning
ong-goblin_cunning.def: Immediately before taking any Courage Test, which is not automatically passed; units consisting entirely of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/goblin_cunning">Goblin Cunning</nuxt-link>, may choose to fail, instead of roll.

ong-creepycrawlies.title: Creepy-Crawlies
ong-creepycrawlies.def: The model gains Ghost Step, and model parts with Mount gain Poison Attacks.

ong-headbashers.title: Headbashers
ong-headbashers.def:
Legendary.
Units containing Headbashers gain Bodyguard(General), and Rank-and-File model parts with Orc in the unit gain Lethal Strike. Additionally, units with Headbashers that count towards Core count towards Special instead.

ong-unprofessional_courtesy.title: Unprofessional Courtesy
ong-unprofessional_courtesy.def: Each unit can only be chosen up to three times per Player Turn for the deployment of models with Hidden, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/surprise">Surprise</nuxt-link>.

ong-crude_weapons.title: Crude Weapons
ong-crude_weapons.def: The model cannot benefit from Parry. After the First Round of Combat, and until the model is no longer Engaged in Combat, all its Melee Weapons count as Hand Weapon for all rules purposes.

ong-brood_rivalry.title: Brood Rivalry
ong-brood_rivalry.def: The model part gains +1 Att while another friendly unit is Engaged in Combat, anywhere on the Battlefield. Units composed entirely of Characters cannot benefit from this rule.

ong-force_of_destruction.title: Force of Destruction
ong-force_of_destruction.def:
The model must perform a move in the movement phase if able to, and cannot declare any Charges, and other units cannot Declare any Charges against the model. The model and other units ignore each other regarding the Unit Spacing rule for all movement and can touch and move through one another during any movement (excluding Ambush).

When the model touches another unit, the model is immediately removed as a casualty, and the other unit immediately suffers X hits with the model's Str and AP. If several units are touched simultaneously, the owner of the model with Force of Destruction chooses which unit suffers the hits.

If the model was removed due to another unit moving into contact with it, that unit suffers an additional D6 hits.



Health Point losses caused by Force of Destruction in the Charge Phase do not cause Panic Test

ong-war_cry.title: War Cry!
ong-war_cry.def:
One use only. Duration: One Turn. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn, provided the General is on the Battlefield and not Shaken. Apply the following effects until :

  • Friendly units gain +1" Cha and +1" Mob.

  • If the General is a Goblin Demagogue or a Goblin Witch, friendly units with Goblin, while not Engaged in Combat, gain Light Troops.

  • If the General is an Orc Warlord or an Orc Shaman, friendly units with Orc have their Charge Range rolls Maximised.

ong-guile_and_fury.title: Guile and Fury
ong-guile_and_fury.def:
Augment:
Cannot be cast by Goblin.
The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are all increased by 1".

Hex:
Cannot be cast by Orc.
The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.title: Omen of the Apocalypse
ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.def: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP. X is equal to the number of friendly units containing Orc that are Engaged in Combat anywhere on the Battlefield, up to a maximum of 3.

ong-attack_gnasher.title: Attack Gnasher
ong-attack_gnasher.def: The wielder must perform 3 additional Standard Melee Attacks, that have their Str always set to 5 and AP always set to 2.

ong-tazreks_guard.title: Tazrek's Guard
ong-tazreks_guard.def: +1 HP and Res is set to 6.

ong-troll_hide.title: Troll Hide
ong-troll_hide.def: Mob is set to 6". The model's base is changed to 40×40 mm and its Height is set to 3. The model's base change cannot be ignored. .

ong-goga_cauldron.title: Goga Cauldron
ong-goga_cauldron.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Phase . Until the end of the Player Turn, the bearer’s unit gains Fearless, Unstable, Dying Blow.

ong-skull_fetish.title: Skull Fetish
ong-skull_fetish.def: During the Siphon the Veil step of your Magic Phase, the wearer may gain Channel (D3) with Duration: One Turn. If a ‘3’ is rolled for this: all units within 6" of the wearer, suffers the Witchfire Miscast effect, where X is equal to 5.

ong-monster_munch.title: Monster Munch
ong-monster_munch.def: The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell(6+).

ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.title: Pan of Protection Pinchin'
ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.def:
When successfully wounded, the bearer may choose to use the attacker's Arm and/or its Special Save:
  • Use the Arm that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Arm (including any modifiers), if available.
  • Use the Special Save that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Special Save (including any modifiers), if available.

ong-gnasher_bait.title: Gnasher Bait
ong-gnasher_bait.def: Friendly Gnashers units within 18" gain Frenzy, Fury, and their Charge Range rolls are Maximised.

ong-moon_shrooms.title: Moon Shrooms
ong-moon_shrooms.def: Cannot be activated at the same turn as the War Cry! The bearer's unit acts as if the General had used the War Cry! this turn.

ong-splatterer.title: Splatterer
ong-splatterer.def:
Splatterer - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Splatterer448"173Artillery, Area Attack(2×2), Direct Hit(Multiple Wounds(2))


Git Launcher - Shooting Weapon

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Git Launcher448"1--Artillery, Git Launcher

id-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
id-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/infernal_armour">Infernal Armour</nuxt-link>, Commanding Presence(12", Insignificant), First Strike(Stubborn).

id-big_brother.title: Big Brother
id-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and the roll for the number of hits it does with its Stomp Attack is Maximised.

id-giant_club.title: Giant Club
id-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

+1 Str and +1 AP.

+1 Str and +1 AP.

id-tower_shield.title: Tower Shield
id-tower_shield.def:
- Personal Protection

The model gains +1 Arm, Parry, Hard Target(1).

The model gains +1 Arm, Parry, Hard Target(1).

id-infernal_lash.title: Infernal Lash
id-infernal_lash.def:
- Melee Weapon

+2 Agi. Once per Melee Phase, when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in a Combat within 6" of the wielder, you may activate the following ability:
Choose a single friendly unit within 6" of the wielder (which can be the wielder itself). The chosen unit gains Flaming Attacks(Melee), Magical Attacks(Melee) until the end of the Melee Phase.

+2 Agi. Once per Melee Phase, when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in a Combat within 6" of the wielder, you may activate the following ability:

Choose a single friendly unit within 6" of the wielder (which can be the wielder itself). The chosen unit gains Flaming Attacks(Melee), Magical Attacks(Melee) until the end of the Melee Phase.

id-theocratic_litigators.title: Theocratic Litigators
id-theocratic_litigators.def: The model's unit and enemy units in contact with the model's unit gain Magic Resistance (2), which is also applied to friendly spells. This Magic Resistance value cannot be increased.

id-defy_death.title: Defy Death
id-defy_death.def: To wound rolls of Melee Attacks distributed onto a model with this rule of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’ are always considered failed.

id-higher_calibre.title: Higher Calibre
id-higher_calibre.def: The Range of the model's Shooting Weapon is doubled. Enemy units hit by the weapon suffer -1" Cha and -1" Mob, both to a minimum of 3" Duration: One Turn.

id-firing_platform.title: Firing Platform
id-firing_platform.def:
Shooting Attacks against the model's unit are all resolved against the Infernal Bastion. In addition, models in the Infernal Bastions unit may draw Line of Sight as if they were Height 5, and from any point of the Infernal Bastion's Front Facing when shooting or casting spells. If so, as long as the unit has at least one Proper Rank:
  • A maximum of 20 models can shoot from the unit. These models can shoot regardless of the rank they are positioned in.
  • Measure their range from the Infernal Bastion.

*See Infernal Bastion unit entry.

id-full_steam_ahead.title: Full Steam Ahead!
id-full_steam_ahead.def: The model cannot choose to Pursue, unless it is the first Round of Combat and it is is Charging, in which case it must Pursue (including Overrun).

id-rock_crusher.title: Rock Crusher
id-rock_crusher.def: The Chassis's Str is set to 6 and its AP is set to 3.

id-walking_earthquake.title: Walking Earthquake
id-walking_earthquake.def: The model gains Swiftstride, Volcanic Embrace(D3+1), and its Mob is set to 7".

id-walking_volcano.title: Walking Volcano
id-walking_volcano.def: The model gains Volcanic Embrace(2).

id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.title: Riddle of the Lamassu
id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.def:
During enemy Pre-game Selections, the opponent must choose Power or Wisdom.
  • Power: the model gains Channel (1).
  • Wisdom: Immediately choose up to two units from the opponent's Army List. The chosen units begin the game with an Incendiary Marker.

id-keys_to_the_citadel.title: Keys to the Citadel
id-keys_to_the_citadel.def: The model must buy Weapon Enchantments for two of its mundane weapons. The Point Cost of one of the Weapon Enchantments (the cheapest if applicable) is halved, rounding fractions up.

id-prophet_of_ashuruk.title: Prophet of Ashuruk
id-prophet_of_ashuruk.def:
During Pre-game Selections, regardless of its chosen Path of Magic, the model may exchange one of its spells for the Apprentice Spell (#1) of either Alchemy, Pyromancy, Occultism.
The model gains access to the options below.

id-prophet_of_lugar.title: Prophet of Lugar
id-prophet_of_lugar.def: The model gains Aegis (4+), Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks), and -3 Arm, and loses Metal Armour and Infernal Armour. The model part gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. . The model gains access to the options below.

id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.title: Prophet of Nezibkesh
id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.def: The model gains Engineer (Gunnery Team, Infernal Artillery or Infernal Engine). The model gains access to the options below.

id-vassal_governor.title: Vassal Governor
id-vassal_governor.def: Friendly units with Vassal within 12" of one or more models with Vassal Governor gain +1" Mob.

id-chained_together.title: Chained Together
id-chained_together.def: The model's unit may never voluntarily change its number of files. After performing a March Move, the unit loses D6 HP.

id-unbranded.title: Unbranded
id-unbranded.def: The model cannot take any Army specific Magic Items, and can never learn, or swap to Curse of Nezibkesh.

id-taurukh_ritual.title: Taurukh Ritual
id-taurukh_ritual.def:
Max. 2 models/army.

Apply the following to the model:
  • It gains Impact Hits(1), Swiftstride, Centauroid, and its Height is set to 2.

  • Its Cha and Mob are both set to 7".

  • Its base size is changed to 25×50mm.


Apply the following to the model:
  • It gains Impact Hits(1), Swiftstride, Centauroid, and its Height is set to 2.

  • Its Cha and Mob are both set to 7".

  • Its base size is changed to 25×50mm.

id-volcanic_embrace.title: Volcanic Embrace
id-volcanic_embrace.def:
The model part gains Grind Attack(X, AP4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks), Zeal(against Metal Armour).
*These hits always wound on a 4+.

id-oil_flasks.title: Oil Flasks
id-oil_flasks.def:
A Health Pool can use Oil Flasks X times. Each use reduces X by 1, and when X is 0, the rule cannot be used. Before rolling to hit with an attack using Oil Flasks, you may declare that the rule is used.
When using Oil Flasks, apply the following rules:
After resolving all simultaneous attacks, any unit hit by at least one attack with Oil Flasks gains Incendiary.

id-flintlock_axe.def:

id-prophet_of_shamut.title: Prophet of Shamut
id-prophet_of_shamut.def: The model gains access to the options below.

id-incendiary.title: Incendiary
id-incendiary.def:
Give one Incendiary Marker, with Duration: Permanent, to the unit. A unit with one or more Incendiary Markers gains Weakness(Flaming Attacks). Remove one Incendiary Marker:
  • Immediately when the unit suffers one or more wounding hits (before saves are performed) from Ranged Attacks with Flaming Attacks.
  • At the end of a Round of Combat in which the unit suffers one or more wounding hits (before saves are performed) from Melee Attacks with Flaming Attacks.
A Character leaving a unit affected by Incendiary is no longer affected, unless the Character was a single model unit when it gained Incendiary. In that case, the Character keeps those Incendiary Markers.

id-airborne_legends.title: Airborne Legends
id-airborne_legends.def: All models with Fly share a common Max. 2 models/army restriction.

id-curse_of_nezibkesh.title: Curse of Nezibkesh
id-curse_of_nezibkesh.def: The target gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link>.  The target suffers -1 Def and -1 Off, and an additional -1 Def and -1 Off, as long as it has 1 or more <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link> Markers on it.

id-onyx_core.title: Onyx Core
id-onyx_core.def: Str is always 6. Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Weakness(Flaming Attacks)).

id-eye_of_the_bull.title: Eye of the Bull
id-eye_of_the_bull.def: Affects both Shooting and Standard Melee Attacks. Att is always 1, Str is always 5, and AP is always 10. Hits automatically (no to-hit roll required). Multiple Wounds(2, Melee).

id-kadim_binding.title: Kadim Binding
id-kadim_binding.def: Aegis (+1, against Flaming Attacks, max. 3+), , Hand-and-a-Half.

id-blaze_of_protection.title: Blaze of Protection
id-blaze_of_protection.def: Arm is set to 6. At the end of Agility Step 0, each enemy model in contact with the bearer's model that could have allocated attacks towards it, but chose not to, suffers 1 hit with Str 4, AP 0, Magical Attacks, and Flaming Attacks.

id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.title: Banner of the Twice-Branded
id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.def: Models in the bearer's unit gain Shoot in Extra Rank.

id-banner_of_shamut.title: Banner of Shamut
id-banner_of_shamut.def: Models in the bearer's unit gain +1 Off. The bearer's unit gain +1 Combat Score.

id-their_masters_banner.title: Their Master's Banner
id-their_masters_banner.def:
Apply the following effects while the bearer's unit is within range of a friendly model's Commanding Presence:
  • Model parts with Vassal gain Fury.
  • The bearer's unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

id-mask_of_ages.title: Mask of Ages
id-mask_of_ages.def: The wearer gains Aegis (5+, against Grind Attack, Impact Hits, Magical Attacks, and Stomp Attack), Terror, Hatred.

id-golden_idol_of_shamut.title: Golden Idol of Shamut
id-golden_idol_of_shamut.def: If the bearer's model is Height 1 it gains Ghost Step, its Cha is set to 4" and its Mob is set to 6". In addition, the bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell(3+).

id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.title: Tablet of Vezodinezh
id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.def: When the bearer attempts to cast a Learned Spell using four or more Magic Dice, treat a single rolled ‘1’ or ‘2’ as a natural ‘3’.

id-lugars_dice.title: Lugar's Dice
id-lugars_dice.def: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. This cannot be used for Crush Attacks.

id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.title: Breath of the Brass Bull
id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.def: The bearer's model gains +1 HP and First Strike(Grind Attack(X, Magical Attacks, Toxic Attacks)). X is equal to the number of models in contact with the bearer's unit's Front Facing.

id-ring_of_desiccation.title: Ring of Desiccation
id-ring_of_desiccation.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities at the start of a Round of Combat, each enemy unit in contact with the wearer's model gains one <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link> Marker.

dl-falling_star.title: Falling Star
dl-falling_star.def: The model's Def, Off , and Agi are set to twice the model's current number of HP, at the start of each Agility Step.

dl-favored_of_pride.title: Favored of Pride
dl-favored_of_pride.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Omen of Savar as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-acid_blood.title: Acid Blood
dl-acid_blood.def: Whenever this model fails a Regeneration Save against enemy Melee Attacks, it inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the Health Pool of the attacking model, before any casualties are removed.

dl-favored_of_gluttony.title: Favored of Gluttony
dl-favored_of_gluttony.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Maw of Akaan as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-favored_of_wrath.title: Favored of Wrath
dl-favored_of_wrath.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Vanadra's Scourge as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-razor_tentacles.title: Razor Tentacles
dl-razor_tentacles.def: The model gains +5 Att while Engaged with Flank or Rear Facings of enemy units.

dl-tightening_grasp.title: Tightening Grasp
dl-tightening_grasp.def:
The model gains Grind Attack(X). When a model is in the second rank, and not in contact with any enemy model, it can make all it Grind Attacks across models in the front rank directly in front of it.
When the model is not in Engaged in Combat, X is set to 1. After each Round of Combat, X increases by 1 (e.g., Grind Attack(1) becomes Grind Attack(2)).

dl-favored_of_greed.title: Favored of Greed
dl-favored_of_greed.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Miser of Sugulag as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-engine_of_damnation.title: Engine of Damnation (Extraordinary)
dl-engine_of_damnation.def: The model's base size is changed to 150×100 mm, its Height is changed to 5; and it loses WarPlatform and Attached. Its HP are set to 9 and its Cha is set to 5. The model gains Terror, Stomp Attack(D6), Exclusive.

dl-favored_of_sloth.title: Favored of Sloth
dl-favored_of_sloth.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Sentinel of Nukuja as the General.
The unit may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-firestarter.title: Firestarter(X)
dl-firestarter.def: The  unit can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell ( 4). When casting the spell choose one Rank-and-File model to be the Caster.

dl-wings.title: Wings
dl-wings.def: The model’s Cha and Mob are both Set to 7" and it gains Fly.

dl-know_thyself.title: Know Thyself
dl-know_thyself.def: At the begining of the Agility Step when the model's Standard Melee Attacks are made, select one model part from each enemy model in contact. Add their Attack Value Characteristics, excluding any modifiers, to the Attack Value of the Kuulima's Deceiver. At the end of each Round of Combat, the model's Attack Value is set to 1.

dl-attracted_by_magic.title: Attracted by magic
dl-attracted_by_magic.def: Even if the unit is not on the battlefield. For every successfully cast spell in opponents previous Magic Phase this unit's Ambush roll gain Maximized.

dl-favored_of_envy.title: Favored of Envy
dl-favored_of_envy.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Kuulima's Deceiver as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-devour.title: Devour
dl-devour.def:
For each Health Point loss the model causes with Melee Attacks, roll a D6 at the end of the Agility Step. For each 4+ rolled, the model gains +1 Health Point.
When the model has 20+ Health Points, all units within 9" immediately suffer 2D6 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the model is removed as a casualty.

dl-path_of_destruction.title: Path of Destruction
dl-path_of_destruction.def: This model part can allocate Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 0-1). If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated onto a Health Pool with Height (3–4), the total number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

dl-abyssal_armour.title: Abyssal Armour
dl-abyssal_armour.def: During Step 2. C Static Combat Score in a Round of Combat; select a single enemy unit the model is in contact with. For each Magic Item in the selected unit, to a maximum of 3. The wearer's unit gain +1 Combat Resolution.

dl-divine_right.title: Divine Right
dl-divine_right.def: While there is an enemy Character in contact with the model's unit, the model gains Distracting(1).

dl-omniscience.title: Omniscience
dl-omniscience.def: If one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/omniscience">Omniscience</nuxt-link> have neither Marched or Charged in this Game Turn, the owners limit on Excess Magic is increased by  2.

dl-strixian_spirit.title: Strixian Spirit
dl-strixian_spirit.def: The model's Height is set to 5, its HP are set to  7, and its Cha and Mob are both set to 7". It gains Fly, Light Troops, Terror, Stomp Attack(D6), Exclusive.

dl-favored_of_lust.title: Favored of Lust
dl-favored_of_lust.def:
Legendary.
Can only be taken in an army with Courtesan of Cibaresh as the General.
The unit gains Exclusive and may select up to two Manifestations, instead of one.

dl-horde_thresher.title: Horde Thresher
dl-horde_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:
  • Base size changed to 100×100mm.
  • HP set to 6.
  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds is set to (3).
  • Tillers lose Smother(1) and gain Smother(2).
  • Chassis gains Impact Hits(3D3).
  • Max. 3 models/army.
  • Single model.

dl-legion_thresher.title: Legion Thresher
dl-legion_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:
  • Base size changed to 100×150mm.
  • HP set to 8.
  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds is set to (4).
  • Tillers lose Smother(1) and gain Smother(2).
  • Chassis gains Impact Hits(4D3).
  • Max. 2 models/army.
  • Single model.

dl-mountain_breaker.title: Mountain Breaker
dl-mountain_breaker.def:
The model's Charge Range rolls towards units containing Height 5 are Maximized.
Impact Hits gain Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Height 5).

dl-morphlings.title: Morphlings
dl-morphlings.def:
During Pre-game Selections, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose a Manifestation from the list below and apply the effects during the game:
• Mesmerising Plumage
• Torporous Tendrils
• Venom Sacs

dl-smother.title: Smother
dl-smother.def: Melee Attacks towards a model with  Height X  gain +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

dl-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.def: This model part can allocate Stomp Attack onto Health Pools of Height 4 or less (rather than 0-1). If the model part’s Stomp Attack is allocated onto a Health Pool with Height (3–4), the total number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

dl-dominionofsloth.def: In the Charge Phase, enemy units gain Minimised (Charge Range) for Charges against units with one or more models with Dominion of Sloth.

dl-dominionofwrath.def: The model's unit gains Devastating Charge(+1" Adv).

dl-rising_star.title: Rising Star
dl-rising_star.def: Each time attacks made by the model kill an enemy model in a Duel, the model gains a +1 Combat Score modifier for the rest of the game.

dl-elusive.title: Elusive
dl-elusive.def: Units consisting entirely of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/elusive">Elusive</nuxt-link> may declare a Flee Charge Reaction despite being Fearless.

dl-aether_battery.def:

dl-manifestation.title: Manifestation
dl-manifestation.def: During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game. The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell). This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept.

dl-writhing_nightmares.title: Writhing Nightmares
dl-writhing_nightmares.def: Enemy units in contact with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/writhing_nightmares">Writhing Nightmares</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Cou.

dl-malodorous_swarm.title: Malodorous Swarm
dl-malodorous_swarm.def: The unit is never considered to have more than one Proper Rank.

dl-guiding_manifestations.title: Guiding Manifestations
dl-guiding_manifestations.def:
Daemonic Manifestations that have options for Guiding Manifestations have two point costs. Use point cost and rules stated with this colour-coding and notation. Guiding versions must be noted on your Army List.
Guiding Manifestations affect both the bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit (as long as the bearer remains in the unit), as if the models themselves had the Daemonic Manifestation. Note that Guiding and non-Guiding Manifestations are considered to be the same Daemonic Manifestation.

dl-living_shield.title: Living Shield
dl-living_shield.def:
One use only; Duration: Until the end of the Phase.
May be activated just before the model's unit rolls a Break Test. The Break Test is automatically failed, and the HP loss suffered from Supernal is halved, rounding fractions down.

dl-unnatural_roots.title: Unnatural Roots
dl-unnatural_roots.def: A unit containing this manifestation once or more gain Resolute (1)

dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.title: Mark of the Eternal Champion
dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.def: If taken by a Wizard, the model knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) as an additional spell. If taken by a unit or model that is not a Wizard, it gains Wizard Conclave(1) with Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) instead.

dl-grasping_proboscis.title: Grasping Proboscis
dl-grasping_proboscis.def: Units in base contact with the bearer loses Devastating Charge.

dl-mirrored_scales.title: Mirrored Scales
dl-mirrored_scales.def: Each Melee Attack allocated towards the model  for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit hits the attacking model's Health Pool instead.

dl-dark_hide.title: Dark Hide
dl-dark_hide.def:
Max 3 per army
At the start of step 3.F Move Vanguard Units you may remove units with this Manifestation from the Battlefield and deploy them again elsewhere, following their normal deployment restrictions.

dl-cloven_hooves.title: Cloven Hooves
dl-cloven_hooves.def: Model parts without Mount or Construct gain Grind Attack(D3, Str 5 AP 2, Magical Attacks)

dl-hellish_larynx.title: Hellish Larynx
dl-hellish_larynx.def: The model part gains Breath Attack(Str 3, AP 2, Magical Attacks, Stand and Shoot).

dl-visage_of_cosmic_horror.title: Visage of Cosmic Horror
dl-visage_of_cosmic_horror.def:
One use only; Duration: Until the end of the Phase.
May be activated at the at start of a friendly Charge Phase. When activated, the model gains Horror and its Charge Range rolls gain Maximized.

dl-greenfire_eyes.title: Greenfire Eyes
dl-greenfire_eyes.def: The model's Charge Range rolls when made towards a unit containing Light Armour or Metal Armour are Maximised.

dl-digestive_vomit.title: Digestive Vomit
dl-digestive_vomit.def: If the model has previously been on the winning side of a Combat while having this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link>, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP. Duration: Permanent.

dl-broodmother.title: Broodmother
dl-broodmother.def: After a Round of Combat in which at least one attack with this Manifestation caused an unsaved wound, all attacks from models in the unit with this Manifestation gain Hatred until the end of the next Player Turn.

dl-divining_snout.title: Divining Snout
dl-divining_snout.def: Charge Range rolls made towards units containing at least one Enchanted Item are Maximised.

dl-segmented_shell.title: Segmented Shell
dl-segmented_shell.def: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds(X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

dl-hidden_knives.title: Hidden Knives
dl-hidden_knives.def: Melee Attacks allocated towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing from the model  gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

dl-golden_helm.title: Golden Helm
dl-golden_helm.def: Courage Tests taken by the unit gain Minimised.

dl-sorcerous_antennae.title: Sorcerous Antennae
dl-sorcerous_antennae.def: Add one additional Magic Dice to your pool during Siphon the Veil in your Magic Phase for each unit containing this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link>.

dl-incendiary_ichor.title: Incendiary Ichor
dl-incendiary_ichor.def: Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks) and Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

dl-curved_tusks.title: Curved Tusks
dl-curved_tusks.def: The model's Melee Attacks gain +1 Str and +1 AP. For each Melee Attack for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to wound, this model suffers a hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10.

dl-immortal_denizens.title: Immortal Denizens
dl-immortal_denizens.def: Casting Rolls made by a model with Daemon in this army using two or three Magic Dice gain a +1 modifier. In games involving a Daemon Legions Army, add one additional Magic Dice to the Active Player's pool during Siphon the Veil in their Magic Phase (i.e. both playes gain one additional Magic Dice in their Player Turn).

dl-greater_dominion.title: Greater Dominion
dl-greater_dominion.def: At the beginning of your Player Turn, choose a unit with Daemon within 18" of the model. The chosen unit gains Disciplined, with Duration One Turn.

dl-spear_of_infinity.title: Spear of Infinity
dl-spear_of_infinity.def:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack(1×5), Magical Attacks, and Direct Hit(Str 4, AP 3, Multiple Wounds(2)).
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast before this spell in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

dl-energy_bolts.def:

bh-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Drunkard and Strider(Forest). At the end of a friendly Movement Phase, if the model is in contact with a Forest, it may lose all its current weapons and gain Uprooted Tree.

bh-big_brother.title: Big Brother
bh-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its rolls for the number of Stomp Attack hits are Maximised.

Attacks made with this weapon hit automatically and have their Str always set to 5 and their AP always set to 0.

bh-sleeper.title: Sleeper
bh-sleeper.def: Starting on Game Turn 1, the owner may decide whether its arrival from Ambush succeeds or fails, without rolling dice.

bh-strength_from_flesh.def:
- Attack Attribute

Standard Melee Attacks that roll ‘6’ to wound gain Multiple Wounds(D3). If at least one such attack causes HP loss, this model Recovers 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless the model was removed as a casualty).

Standard Melee Attacks that roll ‘6’ to wound gain Multiple Wounds(D3). If at least one such attack causes HP loss, this model Recovers 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless the model was removed as a casualty).

bh-aura_of_madness.title: Aura of Madness
bh-aura_of_madness.def: Enemy units within 6" of one or more models with Aura of Madness suffer -1 Cou.

bh-hunting_horn.title: Hunting Horn
bh-hunting_horn.def: While within 6" of one or more models with Hunting Horn, friendly units gain +1" Cha.

bh-blood_offering.title: Blood Offering
bh-blood_offering.def: A unit that includes at least one Character with Blood Offering may reroll failed Panic Tests at the cost of inflicting one wound with no saves of any kind allowed on a Character with Blood Offering in the unit.

bh-beast_axe.title: Beast Axe
bh-beast_axe.def:
+1 Str, +1 AP, +2 Def, Agi set to 0*.
*Always strike at Agility Step 0, regardless of the wielder's Agility.

bh-hurl_attack.title: Hurl Attack
bh-hurl_attack.def:
