al-path_of_the_favoured.def:
- Universal Rule

Units with more than half of their models with Path of the Favoured must reroll failed Break Tests. In addition, model parts with Path of the Favoured upgraded to a Champion additionally gain +1 Health Point to a maximum of 3, and their Discipline is set to 9.

Units with more than half of their models with Path of the Favoured must reroll failed Break Tests. In addition, model parts with Path of the Favoured upgraded to a Champion additionally gain +1 Health Point to a maximum of 3, and their Discipline is set to 9.

al-additional_limbs.title: Additional Limbs
al-additional_limbs.def:
- Universal Rule



The model's March Rate is set to 20" and its Armour is set to 3.

al-sklander_battle_fever.title: Åsklander Battle Fever
al-sklander_battle_fever.def:
Infantry models in units with at least 10 models gain the following effects:
  • Fight in Extra Rank if using a Close Combat Weapon with Two-Handed
  • +1 Armour if using a Shield
This cannot be used while the model's unit is Engaged in its Flank or Rear Facing.

al-unburnt.title: Unburnt
al-unburnt.def: Successful to-wound rolls of attacks that are Flaming Attacks made against the model must be rerolled. In addition, the model considers all units consisting entirely of models without Unburnt as Insignificant.

al-berserkers_bear_pelt.title: Berserker's Bear Pelt
al-berserkers_bear_pelt.def:
Light Armour. The bearer gains Swiftstride and Unstable.
In addition, at the start of any of your Player Turns, all models with Berserker's Bear Pelt in a unit may choose to lose their Shield and gain +1 Strength, Fury, Fearless, Frenzy, and . The effects last for the remainder of the game.

al-legendary_beasts.title: Legendary Beasts
al-legendary_beasts.def: The sum of the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/legendary_beasts">Legendary Beasts</nuxt-link> values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 750 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

al-frostbite.title: Frostbite
al-frostbite.def: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

al-byargfylli.title: Byargfylli
al-byargfylli.def: Attacks made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks, and gain Lethal Strike and .

al-eyratki.title: Eyratöki
al-eyratki.def: The wielder gains Crush Attack, and can perform two Crush Attacks instead of one (provided it declared the use of its Crush Attack at the end of step 4 of the Round of Combat Sequence as usual).

al-symbol_of_slaughter.title: Symbol of Slaughter
al-symbol_of_slaughter.def: Attacks with this weapon become Magical Attacks. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and +2 Agility. Close Combat Attacks made against the wielder's model gain +1 to hit.

al-raven_banner.title: Raven Banner
al-raven_banner.def: The bearer's unit gains Fury, Fearless, and Frenzy.

al-gunagrs_armour.title: Gunagr's Armour
al-gunagrs_armour.def: The bearer gains Fearless and can never be wounded on better than 4+.

al-norns_bones.title: Norn's Bones
al-norns_bones.def: The Wizard can select its spells from all the Learned Spells of its chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. This rule overrides the Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Apprentice or Adept.

al-harp_of_bragi.title: Harp of Bragi
al-harp_of_bragi.def: The range of the bearer's Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag is always 18".

hg-slingers.title: Slingers
hg-slingers.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Hard Target (1), Insignificant, Skirmisher, and Sling (3+).

The model gains Hard Target (1), Insignificant, Skirmisher, and Sling (3+).

hg-disciples.title: Disciples
hg-disciples.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Swiftstride. In addition, while the model's unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 to hit and +3 Armour Penetration.

The model gains Swiftstride. In addition, while the model's unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 to hit and +3 Armour Penetration.

hg-sling.title: Sling
hg-sling.def:
- Shooting Weapon

Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0. The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

hg-ballista.title: Ballista
hg-ballista.def: Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, [Multiple Wounds(D3)], Area Attack(1×5).

hg-loyal_lieutenant.title: Loyal Lieutenant
hg-loyal_lieutenant.def:
- Universal Rule

The model can only join units that contains at least one R&F model with the same Height and Type and that do not contain any other models with Loyal Lieutenant.

The model can only join units that contains at least one R&F model with the same Height and Type and that do not contain any other models with Loyal Lieutenant.

hg-royal_gogyag_barding.title: Royal Gogyag Barding
hg-royal_gogyag_barding.def:
- Personal Protection

When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, (X) halve X, rounding fractions up.

When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, (X) halve X, rounding fractions up.

hg-cavalry_commander.title: Cavalry Commander
hg-cavalry_commander.def:
- Universal Rule

The model must take a mount. The model's unit must reroll any natural rolls of '1' when rolling for Charge Range in the Charge Phase.

The model must take a mount. The model's unit must reroll any natural rolls of '1' when rolling for Charge Range in the Charge Phase.

hg-archery_commander.title: Archery Commander
hg-archery_commander.def:
- Universal Rule

The model's unit gains Quick to Fire.

The model's unit gains Quick to Fire.

hg-shah.title: Shah
hg-shah.def:
- Universal Rule

The model part gains Hatred, its Special Item allowance is increased to 200 pts, and its Discipline is set to 9.

The model part gains Hatred, its Special Item allowance is increased to 200 pts, and its Discipline is set to 9.

hg-saddle_cannon.title: Saddle Cannon
hg-saddle_cannon.def:
- Shooting Weapon

Range 24", Shots D6, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

hg-hob_cohesion.title: Hob Cohesion
hg-hob_cohesion.def: For the purpose of receiving Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag from friendly models, the model counts as 6" closer to those models.

hg-iron_rain.title: Iron Rain
hg-iron_rain.def:
If one or more of the following conditions are met, the Shooting Attack gains +1 to hit and always has at least Armour Penetration 1 :


  • The attacker is located in the target's Flank or Rear Arc.

  • The target has suffered one or more hits from Slings earlier in the same Shooting Phase, and no other Shooting Attack has hit the unit since then.

hg-infernal_armour.title: Infernal Armour
hg-infernal_armour.def: Plate Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (5+, against Flaming Attacks).

hg-flintlock_axe.title: Flintlock Axe
hg-flintlock_axe.def:
Range 18", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 2, Shoot in Extra Rank. Counts as a Halberd in Close Combat.

Counts as a Halberd in Close Combat.

hg-blunderbuss.title: Blunderbuss
hg-blunderbuss.def: Range 12", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 3, Accurate, Quick to Fire, March and Shoot, Steady Aim.

hg-infernal_lackey.title: Infernal Lackey
hg-infernal_lackey.def: The model gains Infernal Armour and Flintlock Axe (3+). Its Discipline is set to 8, and it must choose Pyromancy as its Path of Magic.

hg-boiling_oil.title: Boiling Oil
hg-boiling_oil.def: If one or more simultaneous attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> hit, after resolving these attacks, the target unit gains one <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> marker. If a unit with one or more <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> markers is targeted by Shooting Attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link>, the shooting models are considered to be Located in the target's Rear Arc for the purpose of <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link> (not for the purpose of other rules like Area Attack). Remove all markers from a unit when it is hit by one or more attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link> or at the end of the Shooting Phase, whichever comes first.

hg-warrior_vassals.title: Warrior Vassals
hg-warrior_vassals.def: The total Combat Score bonus from each player gained in Duels (from lost Health Points on enemy units and Overkill), is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 0.

hg-hob_war_cry.title: Hob War Cry!
hg-hob_war_cry.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn, provided the General is on the Battlefield and not Fleeing. Apply the following effects until the end of the Player Turn:


  • All friendly units gain +1" Advance Rate, +2" March Rate, and Hold the Line.

hg-regimental_mascot.title: Regimental Mascot
hg-regimental_mascot.def: The model must be deployed in, and can only join a Hob Levies unit. The model can never voluntarily leave its unit.

hg-chains_of_pride.title: Chains of Pride
hg-chains_of_pride.def: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

hg-wicked_serrations.title: Wicked Serrations
hg-wicked_serrations.def: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Lightning Reflexes and +1 Attack Value. In addition, single model units that have suffered one or more hits from this weapon suffer -1 Resilience and -1 Attack Value until the end of the Combat Phase.

hg-rocket_arrows.title: Rocket Arrows
hg-rocket_arrows.def: Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 2 [10], Area Attack(1×5), [Multiple Wounds (2)], Reload!

hg-deaths_head_aura.title: Death's Head Aura
hg-deaths_head_aura.def: If without Mount, the wearer gains +2 Armour. If mounted, the wearer gains +1 Armour instead. In addition, the wearer gains Aegis (3+, against Special Attacks).

hg-predator_pennant.title: Predator Pennant
hg-predator_pennant.def: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge(Distracting).

hg-baited_banner.title: Baited Banner
hg-baited_banner.def: Model parts with in the bearer's unit gain Hatred.

hg-green_tide.title: Green Tide
hg-green_tide.def: The bearer's unit gains Fight in Extra Rank.

hg-breath_of_the_brass_bull.title: Breath of the Brass Bull
hg-breath_of_the_brass_bull.def: The bearer's model gains +1 Health Point and the bearer gains Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks).

hg-zartoshts_chains.title: Zartosht's Chains
hg-zartoshts_chains.def: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model suffer -2 Defensive Skill. The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model is subject to Minimised Roll.

er-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
er-giant_see_giant_do.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Cult of Errahman and Regeneration (6+).

er-big_brother.title: Big Brother
er-big_brother.def:
- Universal Rule

The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The model gains Maximised.

The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The model gains Maximised.

er-giant_club.title: Giant Club
er-giant_club.def:
- Melee Weapon

Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

er-rabid_spasms.title: Rabid Spasms
er-rabid_spasms.def:
- Attack Attribute -- Close Combat

Whenever the model would inflict 1 Toxic Attacks hit from Cult of Errahman, it inflicts 2 hits instead.

Whenever the model would inflict 1 Toxic Attacks hit from Cult of Errahman, it inflicts 2 hits instead.

er-virulent_fumes.title: Virulent Fumes
er-virulent_fumes.def:
- Universal Rule

Infantry models in friendly units within 6" of the model gain Regeneration (+1, max. 4+).

Infantry models in friendly units within 6" of the model gain Regeneration (+1, max. 4+).

er-bubonic_brew.title: Bubonic Brew
er-bubonic_brew.def: Catapult(6×6). Range 12--60", Shots 1, Str 1, AP 10. Units that suffer one or more Health Point losses from a Shooting Attack made with this weapon count as having the Sacred Plague Dread Rot successfully cast on them.

er-the_end_is_nigh.title: The End is Nigh
er-the_end_is_nigh.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, and loses Scoring.

The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, and loses Scoring.

er-apostle_of_plague.title: Apostle of Plague
er-apostle_of_plague.def:
- Universal Rule

While within 12" of the model, friendly units gain Minimised (Discipline Tests).

While within 12" of the model, friendly units gain Minimised (Discipline Tests).

er-pestilent_pulpit.title: Pestilent Pulpit
er-pestilent_pulpit.def:
- Universal Rule

The model knows one additional Learned Spell, and the model’s unit gains Fearless and Poison Attacks. If the models already had Poison Attacks, then they wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of ‘5’ or ‘6’, unless the target has Immune (Poison Attacks).

The model knows one additional Learned Spell, and the model’s unit gains Fearless and Poison Attacks. If the models already had Poison Attacks, then they wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of ‘5’ or ‘6’, unless the target has Immune (Poison Attacks).

er-holy_triumvirate.title: Holy Triumvirate
er-holy_triumvirate.def:
- Universal Rule

If there are at least 3 models with Holy Triumvirate on your Army List, these models can all select spells as follows:
  • Wizard Apprentices: select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, and 4 of their chosen Path.
  • Wizard Adepts: select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6 of their chosen Path.
  • During Spell Selection, each Wizard can choose to select one Learned Spell fewer than usual and to select 1 Sacred Plague instead.

If there are at least 3 models with on your Army List, these models can all select spells as follows:
  • Wizard Apprentices: select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, and 4 of their chosen Path.
  • Wizard Adepts: select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6 of their chosen Path.
  • During Spell Selection, each Wizard can choose to select one Learned Spell fewer than usual and to select 1 Sacred Plague instead.

er-sling.title: Sling
er-sling.def:
- Shooting Weapon

Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0. The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

er-insurgents.title: Insurgents
er-insurgents.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, and loses Scoring.

The model gains Hard Target(1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, and loses Scoring.

er-sacred_plagues.title: Sacred Plagues
er-sacred_plagues.def:
Sacred Plagues are upgrades that certain Cult of Errahman Characters and Champions may take. Sacred Plagues are Bound Spells with Power Level (4/8) and Duration: Permanent.
Certain Champions may choose 1 Sacred Plague from the list below that must be noted on the Army List and that has Range 8". Certain Characters may choose up to 4 different Sacred Plagues that they select from the list below during Spell Selection and that have Range 18".
Instead of measuring a Sacred Plague's Range from the Caster as normal, it can be measured from any unit under the effect of a Sacred Plague within 18" of the Caster. If so, the Range is set to 8".
Slug PoxHexThe target suffers -2 Agility and -2" . TrollscaleAugmentThe target gains and +1 Resilience. Gnashing FeverUniversalThe target gains , Fearless, and Frenzy. Dread RotUniversalAt the start of each Magic Phase, the target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 2, Armour Penetration 1, and Lethal Strike.An army cannot attempt to cast the same Sacred Plague more than twice during the same Magic Phase. Only one Sacred Plague can affect a unit at a time (the one most recently successfully cast).
At the end of step 3 of any Magic Phase Sequence (after Siphon the Veil), the opponent may remove one or more dice from their Magic Dice Pool. For each removed Magic Dice, the opponent nominates a unit (friend or foe) under the effect of a Sacred Plague. The Sacred Plague affecting the nominated unit immediately ends.

er-trollscale.title: Trollscale
er-trollscale.def: The target gains and +1 Resilience.

er-gnashing_fever.title: Gnashing Fever
er-gnashing_fever.def: The target gains , Fearless, and Frenzy.

er-dread_rot.title: Dread Rot
er-dread_rot.def: At the start of each Magic Phase, the target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 2, Armour Penetration 1, and Lethal Strike.

er-callous.title: Callous
er-callous.def:
Health Point losses of the model that are caused by friendly models are ignored for Panic (including units destroyed due to attacks from friendly models). The model may use Shooting Attacks against enemy units Engaged in Combat, with the following rules and restrictions:
  • Friendly units Engaged in this Combat are ignored for Cover purposes (but not for drawing Line of Sight).
  • Roll to hit as normal against the intended target. Immediately after determining the number of hits, roll a D6 for each hit. On a roll of 4+, the hit is distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target. Otherwise, proceed as normal.

er-fear_no_evil.title: Fear no Evil
er-fear_no_evil.def: While the model's unit is Steadfast and does not suffer from Disrupted Ranks, it gains Fearless and . In addition, while joined by one or more Characters with Cult of Errahman, Charge, Pursuit, and Overrun Moves of the model's unit gain Swiftstride.

er-life_is_cheap.title: Life is Cheap
er-life_is_cheap.def: When calculating Combat Score, halve the first 10 Health Point losses of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/life_is_cheap">Life is Cheap</nuxt-link> per unit, rounding fractions up. This does not affect Combat Score bonuses from Overkill.

er-martyrdom.title: Martyrdom
er-martyrdom.def: When a friendly model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/martyrdom">Martyrdom</nuxt-link> is removed as a casualty, place a marker for each of the model's initial Health Points in a Martyr Pool. At the start of any friendly Siphon the Veil, you may remove 10 or more markers from your Martyr Pool and gain 1 Veil Token for every 10 removed markers, up to a maximum of 3 Veil Tokens per Magic Phase.

er-cult_of_errahman.title: Cult of Errahman
er-cult_of_errahman.def:
Whenever a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit for an enemy Close Combat Attack allocated towards a model with Cult of Errahman, the model part inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the attacking model's unit in the same Initiative Step, before any casualties are removed.
models with Cult of Errahman cannot be joined by models without Cult of Errahman.

er-plague_flail.title: Plague Flail
er-plague_flail.def: Halberd. The wielder gains Devastating Charge(Lethal Strike). In addition, the wielder and enemy units in base contact with one or more models using a Plague Flail suffer -1 Defensive Skill.

er-bloodpox_blades.title: Bloodpox Blades
er-bloodpox_blades.def: Paired Weapons. Attacks made with Bloodpox Blades become Poison Attacks.

er-toxic_incense.title: Toxic Incense
er-toxic_incense.def: While using this weapon, the wielder gains D3 that are resolved with Toxic Attacks at Initiative Step 10.

er-pestilential_wrath.title: Pestilential Wrath
er-pestilential_wrath.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Armour Penetration. In addition, attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’ made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and gain Multiple Wounds(D3).

er-eye_of_errahman.title: Eye of Errahman
er-eye_of_errahman.def: The bearer and models in the bearer's unit gain . In addition, for each natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ with a Close Combat Attack made by the bearer's unit, the bearer's unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 3 and Armour Penetration 0 in the same Initiative Step. This is considered a Special Attack.

er-martyrs_shroud.title: Martyr's Shroud
er-martyrs_shroud.def: models with Cult of Errahman in the bearer's unit gain Regeneration (6+).

er-plague_prophets_blessing.title: Plague Prophet's Blessing
er-plague_prophets_blessing.def: The wearer gains +1 Health Point and Regeneration (5+). Successful to-hit rolls with Close Combat Attacks against the wearer must be rerolled.

er-orators_toga.title: Orator’s Toga
er-orators_toga.def: The bearer gains Stand Behind and cannot issue Duels.

er-putrid_pamphlet.title: Putrid Pamphlet
er-putrid_pamphlet.def: The bearer’s unit must reroll natural to-hit rolls of ‘1’.

er-crucible_of_contagion.title: Crucible of Contagion
er-crucible_of_contagion.def: The bearer’s model gains +1 Health Point, and enemy units in base contact with the bearer’s model suffer -1 Resilience.

er-plague_disciples.title: Plague Disciples
er-plague_disciples.def: The unit replaces its Bloodpox Blades with Plague Flail.

er-underworld_beast.title: Underworld Beast
er-underworld_beast.def: The model gains Random Movement(3D6") and its Attack Value is set to 4D3. It loses the Pitmaster model part, and its base size is changed to 60×100 mm.

df-omen_of_the_dread_fleet.title: Omen of the Dread Fleet
df-omen_of_the_dread_fleet.def:
- Universal Rule

After determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the Pre-Game Sequence), you may choose a single Field, Ruins, or Forest Terrain Feature that becomes Water Terrain. In addition, while the model is on the Battlefield, all Water Terrain Features on the Battlefield are considered Dangerous Terrain(1) for all models.

After determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the Pre-Game Sequence), you may choose a single Field, Ruins, or Forest Terrain Feature that becomes Water Terrain. In addition, while the model is on the Battlefield, all Water Terrain Features on the Battlefield are considered Dangerous Terrain(1) for all models.

df-toxic_scum.title: Toxic Scum
df-toxic_scum.def:
- Universal Rule

At Initiative Step 10, all other units (friend and foe) Engaged in the same Combat as the model suffer D6+1 hits with Toxic Attacks.

At Initiative Step 10, all other units (friend and foe) Engaged in the same Combat as the model suffer D6+1 hits with Toxic Attacks.

df-corsair_boarders.title: Corsair Boarders
df-corsair_boarders.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Heavy Armour and Scoring.

The model gains Heavy Armour and Scoring.

df-corsair_ravagers.title: Corsair Ravagers
df-corsair_ravagers.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains Extra Support(2), Hard Target(1), Light Troops and Skirmisher. In addition, enemy models that are not immune to the effects of in units in base contact with one or more models with Corsair Ravagers suffer -1 Courage.

The model gains Extra Support(2), Hard Target(1), Light Troops and Skirmisher. In addition, enemy models that are not immune to the effects of in units in base contact with one or more models with Corsair Ravagers suffer -1 Courage.

df-obsidian_admiral.title: Obsidian Admiral
df-obsidian_admiral.def:
- Universal Rule

The model part gains +2 Attack Value and its Special Item allowance is increased by 100 pts. In addition, the army may modify the roll for choosing Deployment Zones by -1.

The model part gains +2 Attack Value and its Special Item allowance is increased by 100 pts. In addition, the army may modify the roll for choosing Deployment Zones by -1.

df-colossal_kraken.title: Colossal Kraken
df-colossal_kraken.def:
- Universal Rule

The model gains +2 Health Points, 2 additional Lashmasters, and its base size is changed to 100×150 mm.

The model gains +2 Health Points, 2 additional Lashmasters, and its base size is changed to 100×150 mm.

df-professional_courtesy.title: Professional Courtesy
df-professional_courtesy.def:
- Universal Rule

The model cannot join units that contain another model from the same unit entry.

The model cannot join units that contain another model from the same unit entry.

df-artistry_of_death.title: Artistry of Death
df-artistry_of_death.def:
- Universal Rule

The attack gains +1 to wound. Attacks with Artistry of Death lose Ruthless Efficiency if they had it.

The attack gains +1 to wound. Attacks with Artistry of Death lose Ruthless Efficiency if they had it.

df-captains_orders.title: Captain's Orders
df-captains_orders.def:
- Universal Rule

At step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence (after Spell Selection), the owner must choose one of the following options and apply its effect to all models with Captain's Orders in the army:
  • Give no Quarter: The model gains Scoring.
  • Loot and Pillage: The model gains Light Troops.

At step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence (after Spell Selection), the owner must choose one of the following options and apply its effect to all models with Captain's Orders in the army:

  • Give no Quarter: The model gains Scoring.

  • Loot and Pillage: The model gains Light Troops.

df-mist_weaver.title: Mist Weaver
df-mist_weaver.def:
- Universal Rule

The model’s unit gains Coastal Predator and Devastating Charge(Lethal Strike).

The model’s unit gains Coastal Predator and Devastating Charge(Lethal Strike).

df-storm_singer.title: Storm Singer
df-storm_singer.def:
- Universal Rule

The model can select its spells from all the Learned Spells of its chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. This rule overrides the Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept.

The model can select its spells from all the Learned Spells of its chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. This rule overrides the Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept.

df-advancing_gloom.title: Advancing Gloom
df-advancing_gloom.def:
- Universal Rule

Enemy units within 8" of one or more Sea-Fog Leviathans suffer -1 to hit for Shooting Attacks. In addition, the duration of Shrouded by Mist is extended until the end of the second Game Turn.

Enemy units within 8" of one or more Sea-Fog Leviathans suffer -1 to hit for Shooting Attacks. In addition, the duration of Shrouded by Mist is extended until the end of the second Game Turn.

df-sirens_song.title: Siren's Song
df-sirens_song.def:
- Universal Rule

Combat Reform Tests and March Tests of enemy units within 8" of one or more models with Siren's Song suffer -2 Courage.

Combat Reform Tests and March Tests of enemy units within 8" of one or more models with Siren's Song suffer -2 Courage.

df-irresistible_will.title: Irresistible Will
df-irresistible_will.def:
- Universal Rule

Dispelling rolls against spells cast by the model suffer a -2 Dispelling Modifier if the Casting Attempt was performed with 4 or more Magic Dice.

Dispelling rolls against spells cast by the model suffer a -2 Dispelling Modifier if the Casting Attempt was performed with 4 or more Magic Dice.

df-mistrusted.title: Mistrusted
df-mistrusted.def:
- Universal Rule

If the model is the General, Courage Tests using its Commanding Presence suffer -1 Courage.

If the model is the General, Courage Tests using its Commanding Presence suffer -1 Courage.

df-coastal_predator.title: Coastal Predator
df-coastal_predator.def:
The model gains Strider(Water Terrain). In addition, units gain Devastating Charge(+2" Cha) and Hard Target (1) while both the following conditions are met:

  • More than half of their models have Coastal Predator.

  • More than half of their models have the centre of their base inside a Water Terrain Feature.


Characters without Coastal Predator that Charge out of a unit do not benefit from Coastal Predator.

df-terrors_of_the_deep.title: Terrors of the Deep
df-terrors_of_the_deep.def: The number of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/terrors_of_the_deep">Terrors of the Deep</nuxt-link> in the army is restricted to 1 per 1500 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

df-barbed_nets.title: Barbed Nets
df-barbed_nets.def: At the start of each Round of Combat that the model’s unit is fighting, each unit with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/barbed_nets">Barbed Nets</nuxt-link> must choose one enemy unit in base contact and roll a D6. On 2+, the chosen unit is Netted. Units Netted one or more times suffer -1 Strength and -1 Armour Penetration until the end of the Round of Combat.

df-ruthless_efficiency.title: Ruthless Efficiency
df-ruthless_efficiency.def: The attack gains +1 to wound during the First Round of Combat.

df-repeater_handbowx.title: Repeater Handbow[X]
df-repeater_handbowx.def: Range 12", Shots X, Str 3, AP 0, Accurate, Quick to Fire. 	When shooting from Short Range, the weapon gains +1 Armour Penetration.

df-shrouded_by_mist.title: Shrouded by Mist
df-shrouded_by_mist.def:
Apply the following rules during the first Game Turn:


  • For Shooting Attacks made against units that are more than 12" away, all units (friend and foe) are considered to be in Soft Cover.

  • Charge Range rolls made against units that are more than 12" away are subject to Minimised Roll unless more than half of the Charging unit’s models have Coastal Predator.

df-repeater_handbow.title: Repeater Handbow
df-repeater_handbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater HandbowX12"230
Quick to Fire, Accurate, Stand and Shoot

df-tempest_of_the_storm_witch.title: Tempest of the Storm Witch
df-tempest_of_the_storm_witch.def: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

df-lacerating_touch.title: Lacerating Touch
df-lacerating_touch.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Armour Penetration. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and .

df-hurricanes_fury.title: Hurricane's Fury
df-hurricanes_fury.def: Range 18", Shots 2D6. Shooting Attacks of units that are hit by one or more attacks made with this weapon suffer -1 to hit until the end of the next Player Turn.

df-veil_of_harag.title: Veil of Harag
df-veil_of_harag.def: The bearer can cast Tempest of the Storm Witch (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

df-storm_cloak.title: Storm Cloak
df-storm_cloak.def: The bearer gains Magic Resistance (2) and Hard Target(1).

df-chest_of_enveloping_fog.title: Chest of Enveloping Fog
df-chest_of_enveloping_fog.def: One use only. The owner may activate this Artefact at the end of any friendly Movement Phase and place a Water Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from any enemy units and other Terrain Features. The Water Terrain must fit within a circle with a diameter of 6".

df-black_flag.title: Black Flag
df-black_flag.def: The bearer's unit gains Fear, and while in base contact with the bearer's unit, enemy units gain Maximised (Fear Tests). In addition, friendly units Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer's unit must reroll natural to-wound rolls of '1'.

df-banner_of_tides.title: Banner of Tides
df-banner_of_tides.def: The bearer’s unit gains Feigned Flight.

cl-horde_thresher.title: Horde Thresher
cl-horde_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • Its base size is changed to 100×100mm.

  • Its Health Points are set to 6.

  • It gains 1 additional Tiller.

  • It gains 1 additional Draft Beast.

  • It gains Colossal Stature.

  • The Chassis gains Impact Hits(3D3).

cl-legion_thresher.title: Legion Thresher
cl-legion_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • Its base size is changed to 100×150mm.

  • Its Health Points are set to 8.

  • It gains 2 additional Tillers.

  • It gains 2 additional Draft Beasts.

  • It gains Colossal Stature.

  • The Chassis gains Impact Hits(4D3).

cl-fury.title: Fury
cl-fury.def: If the attack hits with a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’, the attack causes one additional hit usually this means it causes two hits instead of one. This additional hit is Allocated towards the same target.

cl-master_of_ritual.title: Master of Ritual
cl-master_of_ritual.def: The model gains +1 Discipline, Daemonic Summon, Scout, and Commanding Presence(18").

cl-hideout.title: Hideout
cl-hideout.def:
The Cultists army gains +6 to the roll for choosing the Deployment Zone.
Immediately after determining who deploys first (after step 1 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), the owner must place a single Ruins Terrain Feature with its centre in the friendly Deployment Zone and not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain.
This Terrain Feature may not be larger than 8" in length and 8" in width.

cl-eldritch_tome.title: Eldritch Tome
cl-eldritch_tome.def:
Units with Champion only.

The unit gains Wizard Conclave that knows only Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell).

cl-abyssal_conduit.title: Abyssal Conduit
cl-abyssal_conduit.def: One model in the unit that is not a Champion or Musician becomes a Standard Bearer with Channel (1) and Daemonic Summon.

cl-infiltrators.title: Infiltrators
cl-infiltrators.def: The model gains Light Troops, Scout, and Skirmisher and loses Scoring.

cl-firestarter.title: Firestarter
cl-firestarter.def: The Standard Bearer can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell with Power Level (5/8).

cl-talon_scythes.title: Talon Scythes
cl-talon_scythes.def: Attacks made with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/talon_scythes">Talon Scythes</nuxt-link> ignore Parry and, if allocated towards Standard or Large Infantry, gain a +1 to-hit modifier.

cl-dark_conclave.title: Dark Conclave
cl-dark_conclave.def:
Spells cast by the model gain +3" range for each additional friendly Wizard within 12" of the Caster. This bonus can never increase the combined modifier beyond +9", however other sources may.
The model must select 2 spells from: Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell), Umbral Majesty (Occultism), and Smite the Unbeliever (Thaumaturgy) during Spell Selection. This overrides the normal Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept.
When performing a Daemonic Summon with the model, divide the chosen unit's Point Cost by 300 (instead of 200), rounding fractions up, for determining the number of discarded Veil Tokens.

cl-grand_council.title: Grand Council
cl-grand_council.def:
The model's Health Points and Attack Value are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 120 mm round.
The model can also select Rain of Fire (Thaumaturgy) as one of its 2 spells.

cl-doomsday_colossus.title: Doomsday Colossus
cl-doomsday_colossus.def: The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

cl-apostate_automaton.title: Apostate Automaton
cl-apostate_automaton.def: The model gains +1 Resilience, Crush Attack, and its Armour is set to 3.

cl-heretic_golem.title: Heretic Golem
cl-heretic_golem.def: The model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-wicker_man.title: Wicker Man
cl-wicker_man.def: The model gains Flammable, Flaming Attacks, and Grind Attack(3D3). These Grind Attacks are resolved with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, and Flaming Attacks.

cl-dark_fire.title: Dark Fire
cl-dark_fire.def: Armour Save rolls of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’, and ‘4’ are always considered failed when saving wounds caused by Dark Fire.

cl-hellish_growl.title: Hellish Growl
cl-hellish_growl.def: At the start of each Round of Combat, enemy units in base contact with one or more models with Hellish Growl must take a Discipline Test with a -1 modifier. Failed to-wound rolls from attacks made by the model against units that fail this test must be rerolled. The effect lasts until the end of the Round of Combat.

cl-colossal_stature.title: Colossal Stature
cl-colossal_stature.def: The model counts as Gigantic for the purpose of determining the number of Full Ranks.

cl-mountain_breaker.title: Mountain Breaker
cl-mountain_breaker.def: In the Charge Phase, the model gains Maximised(Charge Range) for Charges against units consisting entirely of models with Towering Presence. In addition, the model's Impact Hits gain Multiple Wounds(D3, against ).

cl-spell_craving.title: Spell Craving
cl-spell_craving.def: The model can perform up to 3 Supporting Attacks. When determining Combat Score, a side with at least one model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/spell_craving">Spell Craving</nuxt-link> Engaged in Combat adds +X to its side's Combat Score, where X is the number of non-Bound non-Attribute Spells known by enemy Wizards in units in base contact with it (note that multiple instances of the same spell count as 1 each).

cl-veil_stalker.title: Veil Stalker
cl-veil_stalker.def:
The model follows the rules for Ambush with the following exceptions:
When the unit arrives, the owner may choose to place it within 6" of an enemy model with Channel (instead of entering the Battlefield from the Board Edge). If so, it cannot perform any Advance Moves this Movement Phase (note that this does not prevent the unit from performing a Reform).

cl-tightening_grasp.title: Tightening Grasp
cl-tightening_grasp.def: The model gains Grind Attack(X), and can make Grind Attack as Supporting Attacks, ignoring the maximum number of Supporting Attacks. When the model is not Engaged in Combat, X is set to 1. At the start of each Round of Combat other than the First Round of Combat, if the model is Engaged, X is increased by +1 (e.g. Grind Attack(1) becomes Grind Attack(2)).

cl-elusive.title: Elusive
cl-elusive.def: Units composed entirely of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/elusive">Elusive</nuxt-link> may declare a Flee Charge Reaction despite being Fearless.

cl-falling_star.title: Falling Star
cl-falling_star.def:
The model's Offensive Skill and Defensive Skill are set to twice the model's current number of Health Points.
The model counts as a Character for the purpose of issuing, accepting, and refusing Duels. When the model fights a Duel during a Round of Combat, it gains Stubborn until the end of the Round of Combat.

cl-aether_battery.title: Aether Battery
cl-aether_battery.def: Before rolling for the number of Shots, the owner may choose to discard 1--3 Veil Tokens from their Veil Token pool. If so, the number of Shots is increased by +3 per discarded Veil Token.

cl-manifestation.title: Manifestation
cl-manifestation.def: During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game. The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell). This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept.

cl-writhing_nightmares.title: Writhing Nightmares
cl-writhing_nightmares.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/writhing_nightmares">Writhing Nightmares</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Discipline.

cl-morphlings.title: Morphlings
cl-morphlings.def: During Spell Selection, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose a Manifestation from the list below and apply the effects during the game.

cl-acid_blood.title: Acid Blood
cl-acid_blood.def: For each Regeneration Save the model fails against Melee Attacks, the model immediately inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks against the model that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the model's Health Pool.

cl-chitinous_scales.title: Chitinous Scales
cl-chitinous_scales.def: The model gains +2 Armour, to a maximum of 3.

cl-unnatural_roots.title: Unnatural Roots
cl-unnatural_roots.def: A side with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/unnatural_roots">Unnatural Roots</nuxt-link> Engaged in Combat when Combat Scores are calculated adds +1 to its Combat Score.

cl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.title: Mark of the Eternal Champion
cl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.def: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

cl-mirrored_scales.title: Mirrored Scales
cl-mirrored_scales.def: Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

cl-dark_hide.title: Dark Hide
cl-dark_hide.def: The model gains Scout with the following exception: it must be deployed fully inside the owner's Deployment Zone, and the owner must have deployed at least one unit normally.

cl-iron_husk.title: Iron Husk
cl-iron_husk.def: The model's Resilience is set to 6.

cl-venom_sacs.title: Venom Sacs
cl-venom_sacs.def: The model gains Poison Attacks. If the model's Close Combat Attacks already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, they wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of '5' or '6', unless the target has Immune (Poison Attacks).

cl-greenfire_eyes.title: Greenfire Eyes
cl-greenfire_eyes.def: Units containing one or more models with Greenfire Eyes must reroll any natural rolls of ‘1’ when rolling for Charge Range and Pursuit Distance.

cl-piercing_spike.title: Piercing Spike
cl-piercing_spike.def: Close Combat Attacks made by the model gain +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-unhinging_jaw.title: Unhinging Jaw
cl-unhinging_jaw.def: Failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models made by the model must be rerolled.

cl-digestive_vomit.title: Digestive Vomit
cl-digestive_vomit.def: The first time the model is on the winning side of a combat, it gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

cl-broodmother.title: Broodmother
cl-broodmother.def: For each Health Point loss the model causes with Close Combat Attacks against enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative Step. For each rolled 6+, the model's Health Pool Raises 1 Health Point.

cl-divining_snout.title: Divining Snout
cl-divining_snout.def: The model gains Devastating Charge(+2" Adv) for Charges against units that contain at least one Special Item. The effects only apply if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

cl-smothering_coils.title: Smothering Coils
cl-smothering_coils.def: The model gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

cl-segmented_shell.title: Segmented Shell
cl-segmented_shell.def: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds(X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

cl-hot_blood.title: Hot Blood
cl-hot_blood.def: The model gains Devastating Charge(+2 Agi).

cl-mesmerising_plumage.title: Mesmerising Plumage
cl-mesmerising_plumage.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

cl-hidden_knives.title: Roaming Hands
cl-hidden_knives.def: While the unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-golden_helm.title: Stiff Upper Lip
cl-golden_helm.def: Units with at least one model with this Manifestation gain Minimised (Discipline Tests).

cl-torporous_tendrils.title: Chilling Yawn
cl-torporous_tendrils.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link> suffer -2 Agility.

cl-sorcerous_antennae.title: Sorcerous Antennae
cl-sorcerous_antennae.def: At the start of Siphon the Veil in each of your Magic Phases, choose a single model part in each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation. The chosen model part gains Channel (1) until the end of the Magic Phase.

cl-incendiary_ichor.title: Incendiary Ichor
cl-incendiary_ichor.def: The model gains Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor become Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

cl-curved_tusks.title: Red Haze
cl-curved_tusks.def: The model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

cl-pledged_to_darkness.title: Pledged to Darkness
cl-pledged_to_darkness.def:
Models with Pledged to Darkness gain Exclusive(Pledged to Darkness). While joined by one or more Characters, Rank-and-File models with Pledged to Darkness gain Fearless. Certain units with Pledged to Darkness can choose one of the following 4 Species Archetypes, which give the models the changes stated below. If any unit chooses one of these Species Archetypes, all units capable of doing so must choose the same Species Archetype.

Wayward Children

  • +1" Cha

  • +2" Mob

  • +1 Agility


Fallen Heroes

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi


The Dishonoured

  • -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi


Kinslayers

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • +1 Off

  • +1 Def

*The March Rate of Daemon Symbiotes and Possessed is set to at least 12" instead.

cl-sacrificial_offerings.title: Sacrificial Offerings
cl-sacrificial_offerings.def: Immediately before performing a Casting Attempt with a Wizard in a unit containing one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link>, you may inflict 1 hit against that unit. This hit wounds automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If a Health Point loss was caused against a model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link>, the Casting Attempt gains a +1 Casting Modifier. Each unit can be affected by <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link> only once per Magic Phase.

cl-daemonic_summon.title: Daemonic Summon
cl-daemonic_summon.def:
At the end of step 3 of the owner's Magic Phase (Siphon the Veil), before Veil Token Limits are applied, each non-Fleeing model with Daemonic Summon may perform a single Daemonic Summon:


  • Choose a unit from the Summoned Daemons Army Category on your Army List.

  • Discard a number of Veil Tokens from your Veil Token pool corresponding to the chosen unit's Point Cost divided by 200, rounding fractions up. In the first Game Turn, if the owner has the first Player Turn, a maximum of 2 Veil Tokens may be discarded, and if the owner has the second Player Turn, a maximum of 4 Veil Tokens may be discarded. In all other Game Turns, a maximum of 6 Veil Tokens may be discarded per Player Turn.

  • The chosen unit is deployed with Special Ambush (within 12" of the model that performed the Daemonic Summon). Contrary to the general rules for Special Ambush (X), the unit does not count as having performed a March Move for the purpose of shooting.

cl-the_dishonoured.title: The Dishonoured
cl-the_dishonoured.def:
• -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

cl-smother.title: Smother
cl-smother.def: If the attack is allocated towards a model that has the same Height as the attacker, it gains +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

cl-spear_of_infinity.title: Spear of Infinity
cl-spear_of_infinity.def:
The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack(1×5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

cl-lifeforce_talisman.title: Lifeforce Talisman
cl-lifeforce_talisman.def: Whenever the bearer Miscasts, the owner may choose to inflict D3 hits on the bearer's unit. These hits wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner may choose to apply a +1 or a -1 Miscast Modifier.

cl-ledger_of_souls.title: Ledger of Souls
cl-ledger_of_souls.def: Immediately before removing a friendly model without Insignificant in a unit within 9" of the bearer's model due to enemy attacks, you gain one Veil Token for each Health Point that model had the first time it entered the Battlefield.

cl-crown_of_hubris.title: Crown of Hubris
cl-crown_of_hubris.def: At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 hits on its unit that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner gains 3 additional Veil Tokens.

cl-scurrying_veil.title: Scurrying Veil
cl-scurrying_veil.def:
The bearer's March Rate is set to 20".
In addition, the bearer's model ignores friendly units when moving in the Charge and Movement Phase, but must follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of the move.

cl-gem_of_faiths_tithe.title: Gem of Faith's Tithe
cl-gem_of_faiths_tithe.def: Whenever the bearer attempts to cast a spell, the owner may choose a friendly Champion with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/pledged_to_darkness">Pledged to Darkness</nuxt-link> within 12". If so, use the position of the Champion when drawing Line of Sight and measuring range. For Direct spells, also use the Champion's Front Arc. The owner must use all of these or none at all.

cl-fiendish_snares.title: Fiendish Snares
cl-fiendish_snares.def: Immediately after Deployment Zones are chosen, the owner nominates a Terrain Feature other than Impassable Terrain or Open Terrain with its centre in their half of the Battlefield. The chosen Terrain Feature becomes Dangerous Terrain (2).

cl-lugars_dice.title: Lugar's Dice
cl-lugars_dice.def: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. Crush Attacks are not affected.

cl-army_organisation.def:

1214.4 CoreMin. 25%&
1214.4 SpecialNo limit&
1214.4 Summoned DaemonsMax. 45%&

cl-army_organisation.title: Army Organisation

cl-army_specific_rules.def: Aegis	Unit profiles in this Army Book contain an additional Characteristic, which corresponds to the units' Aegis Saves, shortened Aeg. This Characteristic is treated as if the unit has the Personal Protection Aegis (X+) written on its profile, where X is the Aeg Characteristic value. Not having an Aeg value does not prevent a unit from being the target of an Aegis modifier.
cl-army_specific_rules.title: Army Specific Rules

cl-daemonic_manifestations.def:
Cultists armies possess an additional version of Magic Items called Daemonic Manifestations. They follow the rules for Magic Items, with the exception that they are not Legendary and that models cannot be affected by more than one instance of each Manifestation, unless specifically stated otherwise.

chaosManifestations of Father Chaos

cl-daemonic_manifestations.title: Daemonic Manifestations

cl-army_model_rules.def:
Universal Rules



Pledged to Darkness Models with Pledged to Darkness gain Exclusive(Pledged to Darkness). While joined by one or more Characters, Rank-and-File models with Pledged to Darkness gain Fearless. Certain units with Pledged to Darkness can choose one of the following 4 Species Archetypes, which give the models the changes stated below. If any unit chooses one of these Species Archetypes, all units capable of doing so must choose the same Species Archetype.

Wayward Children

  • +1" Cha

  • +2" Mob

  • +1 Agility


Fallen Heroes

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi


The Dishonoured

  • -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi


Kinslayers

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • +1 Off

  • +1 Def

*The March Rate of Daemon Symbiotes and Possessed is set to at least 12" instead.
Sacrificial Offerings Immediately before performing a Casting Attempt with a Wizard in a unit containing one or more models with Sacrificial Offerings, you may inflict 1 hit against that unit. This hit wounds automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If a Health Point loss was caused against a model with Sacrificial Offerings, the Casting Attempt gains a +1 Casting Modifier. Each unit can be affected by Sacrificial Offerings only once per Magic Phase.
Daemonic Summon At the end of step 3 of the owner's Magic Phase (Siphon the Veil), before Veil Token Limits are applied, each non-Fleeing model with Daemonic Summon may perform a single Daemonic Summon:


  • Choose a unit from the Summoned Daemons Army Category on your Army List.

  • Discard a number of Veil Tokens from your Veil Token pool corresponding to the chosen unit's Point Cost divided by 200, rounding fractions up. In the first Game Turn, if the owner has the first Player Turn, a maximum of 2 Veil Tokens may be discarded, and if the owner has the second Player Turn, a maximum of 4 Veil Tokens may be discarded. In all other Game Turns, a maximum of 6 Veil Tokens may be discarded per Player Turn.

  • The chosen unit is deployed with Special Ambush (within 12" of the model that performed the Daemonic Summon). Contrary to the general rules for Special Ambush (X), the unit does not count as having performed a March Move for the purpose of shooting.


Attack Attributes



Smother If the attack is allocated towards a model that has the same Height as the attacker, it gains +1 to hit and +1 to wound.
cl-army_model_rules.title: Army Model Rules

ls-exalted_of_envy.title: Exalted of Envy
ls-exalted_of_envy.def:
The model gains +1 Health Point. The model may perform Make Way moves even when it is in base contact with an enemy model.
The unit entry's Duplication Limit is changed to 0-2 units/army, and the General of an army with one or more models with Exalted of Envy must take Exalted of Envy.

ls-exalted_of_gluttony.title: Exalted of Gluttony
ls-exalted_of_gluttony.def: The model gains Maximised (Stomp Attacks), One of a Kind, and +1 Health Point. In addition, replace the rules of Devour with (changes from original version in bold): For each Health Point loss the model causes with Close Combat Attacks against enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative Step. For each rolled 4+, the model gains +1 Health Point. When the model has 20 Health Points or more, all units within 12" immediately suffer 2D6 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the model is removed as a casualty.

ls-exalted_of_lust.title: Exalted of Lust
ls-exalted_of_lust.def: The model gains One of a Kind, +1 Health Point, Vanguard, and Aegis (+1, against Ranged Attacks).

ls-exalted_of_greed.title: Exalted of Greed
ls-exalted_of_greed.def: The model gains One of a Kind and +1 Health Point. In addition, all Weapon Enchantments are ignored for as long as their bearers remain in base contact with the model.

ls-exalted_of_pride.title: Exalted of Pride
ls-exalted_of_pride.def: The model gains One of a Kind and +1 Health Point. The rolls for determining the model's Attack Value and Offensive Skill are subject to Maximised Roll.

ls-exalted_of_sloth.title: Exalted of Sloth
ls-exalted_of_sloth.def: The model gains One of a Kind and +1 Health Point. In addition, instead of selecting spells, the model knows all spells from its chosen Path. A single Learned Spell may be exchanged for the Hereditary Spell during Spell Selection.

ls-exalted_of_wrath.title: Exalted of Wrath
ls-exalted_of_wrath.def: The model gains One of a Kind and +1 Health Point. In addition, whenever the model suffers one or more Health Point losses from a Close Combat Attack, it must reroll failed to hit rolls until the end of the Player Turn.

ls-objects_of_envy.title: Objects of Envy
ls-objects_of_envy.def: Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), you must choose a single unit from the opponent's Army List that is not from Core. The models of the chosen units are considered Objects of Envy.

ls-seeker_of_spite.title: Seeker of Spite
ls-seeker_of_spite.def: The number of chosen units for <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/objects_of_envy">Objects of Envy</nuxt-link> is increased by 1.

ls-dominionofenvy.title: Dominion of Envy
ls-dominionofenvy.def: The model's unit must reroll natural to-hit rolls of ‘1’ against Objects of Envy.

ls-dominionofgluttony.title: Dominion of Gluttony
ls-dominionofgluttony.def:
The model's unit gains Frenzy. In addition,
the model's unit must reroll natural to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with its Melee Attacks, including Special Attacks.

ls-dominionofgreed.title: Dominion of Greed
ls-dominionofgreed.def: For every 3 Sin Tokens currently in the Sin Token pool, the model's unit gains +1 Defensive Skill.

ls-dominionoflust.title: Dominion of Lust
ls-dominionoflust.def: The model's unit gains Strider. In addition, the model's unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase while located in the Charged unit's Flank or Rear Arc.

ls-dominionofpride.title: Dominion of Pride
ls-dominionofpride.def: The model's unit may reroll failed Discipline Tests.

ls-dominionofsloth.title: Dominion of Sloth
ls-dominionofsloth.def: In the Charge Phase, enemy units gain Minimised (Charge Range) for Charges against units with one or more models with Dominion of Sloth.

ls-dominionofwrath.title: Dominion of Wrath
ls-dominionofwrath.def: The model's unit gains Devastating Charge(+1" Adv).

ls-lordly_levitator.title: Lordly Levitator
ls-lordly_levitator.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains Strider.

ls-sigils_of_supremacy.title: Sigils of Supremacy
ls-sigils_of_supremacy.def: The model gains +1 Health Point, up to a maximum of 3, and +1 Attack Value.

ls-trolls_blood.title: Troll's Blood
ls-trolls_blood.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains Regeneration (5+). For every natural roll of ‘6’ for a Regeneration Save from the model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit, the model's Health Pool Raises one Health Point at the end of the phase.

ls-expanding_bulk.title: Expanding Bulk
ls-expanding_bulk.def:
The model loses Swiftstride and gains an effect depending on its Height:

  • Standard: Stomp Attacks (1)

  • Large: Stomp Attacks (2)

  • Gigantic: Grind Attacks (D3). Hits from these Grind Attacks that are distributed onto models with Towering Presence automatically fail to wound.

ls-unearthly_larynx.title: Unearthly Larynx
ls-unearthly_larynx.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains Distracting in the first Round of Combat, Elusive (see Sirens), and Feigned Flight.

ls-needle_teeth.title: Needle Teeth
ls-needle_teeth.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains Devastating Charge(+1 Att, +1 AP).

ls-covetous_camouflage.title: Covetous Camouflage
ls-covetous_camouflage.def: The model gains Ambush. At step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence (after Spell Selection), each Character with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/covetous_camouflage">Covetous Camouflage</nuxt-link> may choose to gain Hidden instead. Additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation.

ls-clutching_claws.title: Clutching Claws
ls-clutching_claws.def: When calculating Combat Score, a side with one or more models with this Manifestation Engaged in the Combat adds +X to its Combat Score. When the model is not Engaged in Combat, X is set to 0. At the start of each Round of Combat other than the First Round of Combat, if the model is Engaged, X is increased by 1. If there is more than one unit with this Manifestation Engaged in the same Combat, use the highest X value.

ls-coins_for_eyes.title: Coins for Eyes
ls-coins_for_eyes.def:
The model gains Stubborn while both the following conditions are met:

  • The model is in base contact with an enemy Scoring unit.

  • The model's unit does not have more ranks than files.

ls-chitinous_plates.title: Chitinous Plates
ls-chitinous_plates.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains +2 Armour, up to a maximum of 3.

ls-soporific_secretions.title: Soporific Secretions
ls-soporific_secretions.def: While Engaged in Combat, at the end of each Round of Combat, the model’s unit and all other units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer -1 Strength and -1 Armour Penetration. The effects last until the end of the combat.

ls-lance_of_lethargy.title: Lance of Lethargy
ls-lance_of_lethargy.def: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but instead always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection. In addition, (Witchcraft) becomes the Attribute Spell for Spear of Infinity cast by the model. This instance of can only target the same unit as the Spell that triggered it.

ls-vorpal_blade.title: Vorpal Blade
ls-vorpal_blade.def:
Dominant.
Model parts without Harnessed of the model and of each Rank-and-File model in its unit gain Lethal Strike.

ls-explosive_organs.title: Explosive Organs
ls-explosive_organs.def: When a Rank-and-File model with this Manifestation is removed as a casualty as a result of an enemy Melee Attack, it immediately inflicts 1 hit with Strength 3, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks against the model that caused the Health Point loss, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the model’s Health Pool. Characters inflict 2D6 hits instead. This is considered a Special Attack.

ls-sledgehammer_hand.title: Sledgehammer Hand
ls-sledgehammer_hand.def:
Dominant.
The model and each Rank-and-File model in its unit gains +1 Attack Value.

ls-grasping_proboscis.title: Grasping Proboscis
ls-grasping_proboscis.def: Units in base contact with the bearer loses Devastating Charge.

ls-legions_of_sin.title: Legions of Sin
ls-legions_of_sin.def:
For Army List creation, select one of the seven Legions of Sin. Only unit entries from the selected Legion of Sin may be used in the army. Note that some unit entries may have point costs, duplication limits, Manifestation options, mount options, etc. that differ from the Daemon Legions (DL) Army Book (see 8.D How to read unit entries for the different parts of the unit entries):


  • Each Legion of Sin has access to unique manifestations, whose rules can be found at the beginning of the corresponding chapter in this Supplement.
  • For all unit entries, apply the specifications in their headers in this Supplement Army Book.
  • For the unit profiles, i.e. the units' Characteristic Profiles and Model Rules, including any default and optional unit-specific Model Rules from the DL Army Book, please refer to the DL Army Book. For the Harbinger of each Legion of Sin, please refer to the Harbinger of Father Chaos unit entry.
  • The options given for each unit entry in this Supplement Army Book replace any options given for the corresponding unit entry in the DL Army Book.
  • The Harbinger of each Legion of Sin automatically gains a new Model Rule, and the other Characters gain new optional Model Rules. These Model Rules will be specified in the corresponding unit entry in this Supplement Army Book.
  • Characters cannot take Greater Dominion. Instead, the General must take Greater Dominion of Sin if available (see the Army Model Rules section and the corresponding unit entries).

ls-wages_of_sin.title: Wages of Sin
ls-wages_of_sin.def: During the enemy Siphon the Veil, the opponent may choose to gain up to 2 additional Veil Tokens.

ls-descent_into_sin.title: Descent into Sin
ls-descent_into_sin.def:
An army from this Supplement Army Book uses a Sin Token pool in order to track the Battlefield’s Descent into Sin. At the start of the game, this pool does not contain any Sin Tokens. During the game, specific events will add Sin Tokens to the pool.
Consult the Descent into Sin Table below to determine the effects of the current number of Sin Tokens in the pool. These effects come into play when both of the following conditions are met:


  • The corresponding threshold has been reached.

  • It is the Legion of Sin Player Turn.

In battles between two armies from this Supplement Army Book, track each pool separately.
\
Effects from different thresholds and pools stack and, unless specifically stated otherwise, affect both armies.
\Add one Sin Token to your pool immediately when one of the following conditions is met:

  • The opponent chooses to apply Wages of Sin.
  • At the start of any Melee Phase, one or more friendly Characters with Dominion and/or Greater Dominion of Sin are in base contact with an enemy unit.

In addition, each Legion of Sin has a unique condition for adding Sin Tokens to their Sin Token pool:

  • Envy:
Add 1 Sin Token at the end of a phase in which one or more models with Dominion of Envy cause one or more Health Point losses against an Object of Envy; if one or more units containing Objects of Envy are removed as casualties, add 1 additional Sin Token.

  • Gluttony: Add 2 Sin Tokens at the end of any Melee Phase in which one or more units have been removed as casualties.
  • Greed: Add 1 Sin Token at the end of Siphon the Veil if the Active Player saved 3-5 Veil Tokens;
if 6 Veil Tokens were saved, add 2 Sin Tokens instead.
  • Lust: Add 1 Sin Token at the start of any Melee Phase for each unit that is Engaged with the Flank Facing of an enemy unit,
and 2 Sin Tokens for each unit that is Engaged with the Rear Facing of an enemy unit.
  • Pride: Add 1 Sin Token at the start of the Melee Phase for each combat in which one or more friendly single model units are Engaged with at least one enemy unit with more Full Ranks than themselves, up to a maximum of 2.

  • Sloth: Add 1 Sin Token at the end of any Magic Phase in which at least two non-Attribute Spells were successfully cast; in case of three or more, add 2 Sin Tokens instead.
  • Wrath: Add 1 Sin Token at the end of any Charge Phase in which two units declared a Charge;
if three or more units declared a Charge, add 2 Sin Tokens instead.

ls-greater_dominion_of_sin.title: Greater Dominion of Sin
ls-greater_dominion_of_sin.def: At the start of each friendly Player Turn, you may choose one friendly unit within the model's Commanding Presence range. All models in the chosen unit gain the model's <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/dominion">Dominion</nuxt-link> rule until the start of the next friendly Player Turn.

ls-dominion.title: Dominion
ls-dominion.def: Each Legion of Sin has its own Dominion rule that each Character must take, as specified in the corresponding unit entries.

ls-pride.title: Pride
ls-pride.def: Courage Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Minimised. Command Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

ls-gluttony.title: Gluttony
ls-gluttony.def: The first time a model with this Favour is on the winning side of a combat, its model parts with Path of the Favoured gain +1 Str with Duration: Permanent.

ls-envy.title: Envy
ls-envy.def: Charge Range and Pursue Distance rolls by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

ls-greed.title: Greed
ls-greed.def: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, and Weapon Master. A Chosen Lord with this Favour may take a second item from either the Artefacts category or the Potions and Scrolls category (but cannot take a second item from both categories).

ls-sloth.title: Sloth
ls-sloth.def: The model gains +1 Res. When the model's unit declares a Charge or performs a March Move, the effect is lost until the start of the Melee Phase in the next Player Turn.

ls-wrath.title: Wrath
ls-wrath.def: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Fury, Frenzy, Unruly.

rulebook-artefacts.title: Artefacts
rulebook-artefacts.def: Unique and powerful items that can have various effects. No additional rules apply to <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/artefacts">Artefacts</nuxt-link>.

rulebook-weapon_enchantments.title: Weapon Enchantments
rulebook-weapon_enchantments.def:
Weapon Enchantments are upgrades that enhance weapons. A weapon on which a Weapon Enchantment is applied becomes an Enchanted Weapon. The Army List must indicate which weapon that the model is equipped with is an Enchanted Weapon. Reminder: models are equipped with a Hand Weapon by default. Each Weapon Enchantment can only enchant particular weapon types (e.g. Great Weapon) or a category of weapons (e.g. Melee Weapon).

The following rules apply to all Enchanted Weapons, unless specifically mentioned otherwise:

  • If a model is equipped with an Enchanted Weapon it must use it in Combat whenever possible.

  • All attacks made with the Enchanted Weapon gain Magical Attacks.

  • The Enchanted Weapon follows the rules for both its original weapon type and the Weapon Enchantment.

  • See the rules for weapons ( Model Rules) for details on when to apply modifiers and additional rules.

rulebook-armour_enchantments.title: Armour Enchantments
rulebook-armour_enchantments.def:
These upgrades enchant pieces of armour carried by a model, and can in general be taken by any model. That model is then considered as wearing an Enchanted Armour.

If an Armour Enchantment is restricted to models with a minimum Arm Value, for this purpose only consider the model's part unmodified base Arm Value (excluding Mounts), the number written on the profile in the Army Book.

The following rules apply to all Armour Enchantments, unless specifically mentioned otherwise:

  • Characteristics modifiers, Model Rules, and all other rules associated with Armour Enchantments are generally only applied to the model part wearing the Enchanted Armour, and does not affect other model parts such as mounts. This includes modifiers to Global and Defensive Characteristics. However, note that certain Model Rules, particularly Model Rules that are neither an Attack Attribute nor a weapon, are always applied to the combined model (and not only to individual model parts).

For example the Basalt Infusion provides +1 Arm and Aegis. +1 Arm is a Characteristic modifier and is only applied to the Character wearing the Enchanted Armour. If this Character rides a mount that has its own Armour Value, the extra Arm from Basalt Infusion has no effect on the combined model. However, Aegis is a Global Model Rule, which means it is not applied to an individual model part, but to the whole combined model.

rulebook-shield_enchantments.title: Shield Enchantments
rulebook-shield_enchantments.def:
Shield Enchantments are upgrades made to Shields. An Enchanted Shield follows the rules for both the original Shield and the Shield Enchantment.

The following rules apply to all Shield Enchantments, unless specifically mentioned otherwise:

  • The effect of a Shield Enchantment applies only when the bearer of the Enchanted Shield actually uses the Shield (Remember that a model part cannot use a Shield to protect against Melee Attacks when it is using a Two-Handed weapon in combat).

  • Characteristic modifiers, Model Rules, and all other rules associated with Shield Enchantments follow the same rules as for Armour Enchantments.

rulebook-potions_and_scrolls.title: Potions and Scrolls
rulebook-potions_and_scrolls.def:
Potions and Scrolls are Magic Items that provide temporary effects when consumed by a model.

The following rules apply to all Potions and Scrolls, unless specifically mentioned otherwise:

  • All Potions and Scrolls are One Use Only.

  • Potions and Scrolls can be activated at the start of any Phase or when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in the Melee Phase.

  • Effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

  • Rules for Potions and Scrolls, including Characteristic modifiers and Attack Attributes, are only applied to the model part taking the Magic Item, and does not affect other model parts such as mounts.

rulebook-banner_enchantments.title: Banner Enchantments
rulebook-banner_enchantments.def: Banner Enchantments are upgrades for Battle Standard Bearer and units containing a Standard Bearer, assuming these units have access to Magic Items (as indicated in their unit entry).

rulebook-replicable.title: Replicable
rulebook-replicable.def: Replicable spells, can be attempted to be cast multiple times in the same Magic Phase without suffering the normal -3 modifier to the Casting Roll (or -1 in the case of Bound Spells). Note that the spell still can not be attempted multiple times by the same Wizard.

rulebook-molten_copper.title: Molten Copper
rulebook-molten_copper.def: The target suffers D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Zeal(against Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

rulebook-corruption_of_tin.title: Corruption of Tin
rulebook-corruption_of_tin.def: The target suffers -1 Arm, -1 Agi and gains Metal Armour.

rulebook-living_steel.title: Living Steel
rulebook-living_steel.def: The target gains +1 to hit and Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

rulebook-wall_of_lead.title: Wall of Lead
rulebook-wall_of_lead.def:
Place a Wall Terrain Feature with dimensions 1×6" on the target.

Remove the Terrain Feature when the spell ends.

rulebook-word_of_iron.title: Word of Iron
rulebook-word_of_iron.def: The target gains +2 Arm and  Metal Armour.

rulebook-quicksilver_lash.title: Quicksilver Lash
rulebook-quicksilver_lash.def: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Zeal(against Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

rulebook-duality.title: Duality
rulebook-duality.def:
All Cosmology spells are divided into two versions, representing opposing aspects:
Cosmos



and Chaos


.

When casting a Cosmology spell, always declare which version of the spell you are using, and substitute the square brackets ([𝛼] or [𝛽]) with the content listed in the table at the bottom of each Spell Card corresponding to the chosen version (Cosmos or Chaos).

rulebook-weal_and_woe.title: Weal and Woe
rulebook-weal_and_woe.def:
The target must reroll [𝛼] to-wound rolls, except natural rolls of [𝛽].\

[𝛼]: Failed
[𝛽]: ‘1’
[𝛼]: Successful
[𝛽]: ‘6’

rulebook-hearts_and_minds.title: Hearts and Minds
rulebook-hearts_and_minds.def:
If the target is Shaken, it is treated as if it just passed a Rally Test (i.e. it stops being Shaken and may Pivot). If the target is not Shaken, it must take a Panic Test.

[𝛼]: Hex, Damage
[𝛽]: Augment

rulebook-truth_of_time.title: Truth of Time
rulebook-truth_of_time.def:
The target's Cha and Mob are set to [𝛼].\

[𝛼]: 8"
[𝛽]: 3"

rulebook-ice_and_fire.title: Ice and Fire
rulebook-ice_and_fire.def:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, and Magical Attacks. Successful [𝛼] against wounds caused by this spell must be rerolled.\

[𝛼]: Special Saves
[𝛽]: Armour Saves

rulebook-cosmic_scales.title: Cosmic Scales
rulebook-cosmic_scales.def:
The target gains Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting), Divine Attacks (Melee & Shooting), and it's [𝛼] is set to at least 8.\

[𝛼]: Def
[𝛽]: Off

rulebook-near_and_far.title: Near and Far
rulebook-near_and_far.def:
The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 7, AP 3, and Magical Attacks.\

[𝛼]: Range 24", Hex
[𝛽]: Range 9", Aura*, Universal
*The Caster's unit is not targeted.

rulebook-foresight.title: Foresight
rulebook-foresight.def:
The target gains +Y Def and +X Off, where X and Y depend on the Game Turn number when the spell was cast.



  • Game Turn 1-2: +0 Def and +4 Off

  • Game Turn 3-4: +2 Def and +2 Off

  • Game Turn 5-6: +4 Def and +0 Off



No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

rulebook-fates_judgement.title: Fate's Judgement
rulebook-fates_judgement.def: The target suffers D6+X hits, where X is the Game Turn number when the spell was cast. These hits are set to wound on 4+ and are resolved with AP 0 and Magical Attacks.

rulebook-the_stars_align.title: The Stars Align
rulebook-the_stars_align.def: Target unit must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

rulebook-chance_of_redemption.title: Chance of Redemption
rulebook-chance_of_redemption.def:
The target may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.

In addition, it gains Divine Attacks(Melee).

rulebook-inescapable_doom.title: Inescapable Doom
rulebook-inescapable_doom.def:
Immediately when the spell is cast, and at the start of each of the Caster's subsequent Magic Phases, the target suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

rulebook-augury_of_despair.title: Augury of Despair
rulebook-augury_of_despair.def: The target suffers -3 Off, -3 Agi (to a minimum of 1), and treats all Terrain Features as Dangerous Terrain, including Open Terrain.

rulebook-fountain_of_youth.title: Fountain of Youth
rulebook-fountain_of_youth.def:
Raise 1 HP in the target's Health Pool.

No model can Raise more than 1 HP per turn from this spell.

rulebook-entwining_roots.title: Entwining Roots
rulebook-entwining_roots.def:
The target suffers -2" Cha and -2" Mob, both to a minimum of 2".

In addition the target suffers -2 Agi to a minimum of 1.

rulebook-veil_of_mist.title: Veil of Mist
rulebook-veil_of_mist.def: The target gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/hard_target">Hard Target(1)</nuxt-link> and <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/magic_resistance">Magic Resistance</nuxt-link> (2).

rulebook-natures_venom.title: Nature's Venom
rulebook-natures_venom.def: The target suffers 3D3 hits with Str 3, AP 1, and Magical Attacks. Against units with Light Troops these hits are instead resolved with Str 4 and AP 2.

rulebook-stone_skin.title: Stone Skin
rulebook-stone_skin.def: The target gains +1 Res, and Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

rulebook-earths_blessing.title: Earth's Blessing
rulebook-earths_blessing.def: Place a round Forest, Field or Water Terrain feature (declare which when casting the spell) with a 6" diameter on the target. This Terrain Feature has Dangerous Terrain. If the chosen Terrain Feature has already been created by the Caster using this spell, first remove the Terrain Feature from the Battlefield before placing it again on the target.

rulebook-whispers_of_the_veil.title: Whispers of the Veil
rulebook-whispers_of_the_veil.def:
The target suffers -1 Res.



No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

rulebook-touch_of_the_reaper.title: Touch of the Reaper
rulebook-touch_of_the_reaper.def:
The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.

When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Res with its Cou.

rulebook-danse_macabre.title: Danse Macabre
rulebook-danse_macabre.def:
The target may immediately perform a 4" Magical Move.

In addition, it gains Dying Blow, Ghost Step.

rulebook-chorus_of_the_damned.title: Chorus of the Damned
rulebook-chorus_of_the_damned.def: The target gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/distracting">Distracting(1)</nuxt-link>, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/horror">Horror</nuxt-link>.

rulebook-spectral_blades.title: Spectral Blades
rulebook-spectral_blades.def: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target have their Str always set to 4, AP always set to 4, and gain Magical Attacks.

rulebook-soul_blight.title: Soul Blight
rulebook-soul_blight.def:
The target takes a Courage Test:


  • If passed it suffers D6 hits.

  • If failed it suffers 2D6 hits.


Hits are with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.

When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Res with its Cou.

rulebook-the_sacrifice.title: The Sacrifice
rulebook-the_sacrifice.def: Before casting certain spells (marked on the spell itself), you may choose a friendly unit within 12" of the Caster to immediately suffer from The Devouring Dark.
